Still not sure? No worries. The Journal of Periodontology reported a study where patients undergoing gum treatment used Bristl. They found that compared to brushing with a conventional electric toothbrush, brushing with Bristl using light therapy was more effective by: 

 

 

Light therapy was discovered by a scientist by the name Niels Finsen almost a hundred years ago for which he won the Nobel Prize in Medicine. Light therapy is nothing new to healthcare - similar red and blue lights are often used in facial care to kill bacteria and heal/tighten skin. Bristl is bringing effective light therapy to the normal toothbrushing routine.
 

 
 

 
 

 




 

 
 

 

 

 


Risks & Challenges
Although every project has its risks, the Bristl team is confident that we have minimized all possible risks. We are working with an industry leading custom manufacturer that has impressive experience and is extremely reliable. In short, we can confidently say that you will receive the best product we can deliver in a timely manner.
A large amount of resources have been dedicated to development, prototyping, and manufacturability. We cannot wait to get this product in our backers' hands! We have surpassed the prototype phase and have had samples manufactured in a "mass-produced" fashion to ensure high quality at scale. On top of this, our supply chain has been tested and has a 100% success rate of on time delivery.
All our ducks are in a row (..a very straight and well tested row), and now we just need support from backers to push this business into reality.
The risks we face are those that every business faces. For example, there is always a risk of hazardous shipping conditions from overseas. There also may be a risk of domestic shipping damage. Don't worry! If that happens, we'll replace any products that have been damaged during shipping. While we feel it is very minimal, there is always a risk of faulty electrical wiring. Again, if this is the manufacturer's error, we will certainly replace damaged products.
We're excited and will keep backers informed every step of the way.

story:
For your $1 Bite Zapper send your facebook page with Bite Zapper displayed on it to sales@bitezapper.com



A chapstick size electronic device stopping mosquito bite itching and swelling.

  I have made a career of starting companies that developed technological products..  I've started several companies that developed medical devices, I've also started product development companies that developed consumer electronic products and I even started a toy company to sell a product that we developed called Klixx.

  Creating the Bite Zapper was a labor of love and necessity.  I get bitten often when mosquitoes are around and they leave itchy swelling bites that seem to last forever. Before Bite Zapper, I would scratch bites until they bled without even being aware that I was scratching, often leaving marks on my arms and legs for months.

    It took quite a while, trying different approaches to eliminating the itching and swelling associated with mosquito bites.  I first tried using ultrasonics which worked to a point but it didn't bring the swelling down and needed to be reused often on the same bite to temporarily stop the itching.

  I discovered that there are several different brands of heating devices that claim to eliminate mosquito bites but they hurt when using them and you had to leave them on the bite for a long time, along with the fact that they are quite large compared to the Bite Zapper.  There are some that use a piezo disk that seem to work for a short while and then your itching returns and it didn't do anything about the swelling. 

  So, after playing with the ultrasonic method for a while and at the same time reading about the physiological response our bodies have to mosquito bites and what the exact cause of the itching and swelling was, I came up with an idea that truly works.  It involves pulsing a voltage at the appropriate level and the appropriate frequency. It uses a relatively low voltage and very low current so it does not have to be approved by any government agency and is completely safe.  This approach shuts down your body's response to the bite (Histamine production) which quickly halts the itching and allows the swelling to disappear in a short period of time.

  I recommend using the Bite Zapper for 15 seconds on a fresh mosquito bite. If you are bitten and don't use the Bite Zapper right away (within a couple of minutes) you might have to use the Bite Zapper for a longer period.  I suggest doing 15 seconds, removing the Bite Zapper for a couple of seconds and if it still itches do another 15 seconds you may have to do it several times to eliminate the itching. 

  The Bite Zapper, with all its electronics and a rechargeable lithium battery is the size of a tube of Chapstick, pull off the switch at one end of the tube and you will find it has a built in USB connector to recharge the battery.  Just plug it into a standard USB port either on a computer, a wall adapter with USB ports, a car with USB ports or any other place you find a USB port.  Let it charge ( LED's light up the Bite Zapper alternating red and green while charging and green when it is charged) and it is good for dozens and dozens of mosquito bites on a single charge and the battery should last for years.

I hope your intrigued enough with the thought of eliminating mosquito bite itching and swelling to support our Indiegogo project and look forward to helping you eliminate mosquito bite torture.

Here is a review I received form a trial run we did.

Brittany Marquis:

THANK YOU!!! I took this on my recent 3 week fly-fishing adventure in Idaho and my god, I was able to keep my sanity as the bugs (and bites) were huge yet I was able to stay itch free!

story:
Establishing solid toothbrushing habits is critical to oral health and overall health, but getting kids to brush properly, twice a day, every day, can be a struggle.

 

 

The Truthbruth tracker and mobile application takes parent nagging out of the equation. A decorate sensor the size of a button sits on your child’s toothbrush allowing Truthbrush to quietly monitor daily brushing habits, length of brushing time, brushing technique and missed areas.

 

 

 

The solution provides comprehensive, accurate data collection and real time reporting that takes the guesswork out of whether the kids are brushing regularly and correctly. Stop the power struggle and get the truth.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Dentists tell us that they rely on patients to tell them about their brushing habits. It may come as no surprise that oftentimes a patient’s recollections tend to not reflect what is actually happening at home. Sharing your data with your dentists enables dentist to see real trends in your brushing habits and become a more active participant in improving your family’s oral health.

 

 
 

Don’t take our word for it, Truthbrush™ is endorsed by leading dentists who have seen what it can do for their patients.

 

Dr. Paul Johnson runs a pediatric dental practice in Wellesley, Massachusetts. Dr. Johnson and his professional team specialize in providing state-of-the-art dental care that is especially suited to the needs of infants, children, and teenagers. Dr. Johnson is a past president of the Mass Academy of Pediatric Dentistry and was named a Top Dentist in Boston Magazine for 2020.

 

With your help we can prevent tooth decay

 

 

Why Order Now

  • By backing now, you will receive our first version of the Truthbrush and have a direct channel to provide feedback and shape the future of the product.
  • Your contribution will go directly inventory and marketing and will allow us to grow the service.

story:
What is the meaning of life? What is the ultimate goal of our pursuit? After crossing mountains and oceans, overcoming so many obstacles, I’m sure no one will disagree. it must be to live longer in health and beauty，Before conquering the world, we should take care of ourselves and live life exquisitely and with quality. – LEROU

What do  “Geeky Gadgets“、“Outuro Prossimo”、”Robotic Gizmos” say about LEROU

 

Burnt out from stress; feeling irritated and can’t calm down; having poor sleep quality or can’t sleep at night, eventually causing you to poor mental state then inefficient work the next day.

 

Introducing LEROU Robot, a personal head massager that would make you feel relax and comfortable without obstructing your work. When using it, you will truly feel as if someone is massaging your temples. It stimulates you to be sleepy, and ultimately improve your sleep quality. LEROU Robot will change the way you sleep and relax.  

For those who don’t like crow’s feet , LEROU ROBOT is like a beautician’s fingertips that massages the corner of your eyes. Regular usage can prevent and eliminate the growth of crow's feet.

 Have a question?

Instantly Makes You Feel Comfortable And Relaxation

Using LEROU Robot for massagesis easy and comfortable. It can provide you with immediate comfort and relaxation. It is as if a real masseuse is massaging and calming you down from being upset or negative. 

 Promote Sleep Quality 

LEROU  can reduce stress, relax and calm your mind.  It can even  improve blood circulation in different parts of the head, helping you to get better sleep .

 

 
 

We took LEROU Robot to the streets and select random people to experience and hear what they have to say about LEROU Robot. Most people never see a massager that looked like LEROU Robot, and their first response was "comfort"after trying it. 

 
 
There are no limitations of when or where you can use LEROU Robot, simply use it whenever you need to relax! You can use it at your workplace, in the cab or while waiting for an appointment. It is the portable personal massage robot you ever need.
 
 
 
LEROU Robot implements human massaging simulation technique. So, when you are using LEROU Robot, you will feel as if your masseur is massaging you. The best part? You just need to position LEROU Robot on your head, turn it on, and carry on with your own work. You don’t need to hold anything in place, just let your LEROU do the job for you.
 
 
 
Most conventional head massagers on the market do not simulate manual massage movements. They use vibration, airbag compression, micro-current and other ways. These allow them to sell at a lower price. From our market research, most consumers tend to stop using them after the first experience. These massagers either take up your hands, cover your eyes, or stimulate electricity shock in you. In short, the experience can be terrible and not up to the user’s satisfaction. However, LEROU Robot uses physical-mechanical transmission, allowing the mechanism to fully simulate finger massages that will bring you to a very relaxedstate without any side effects. We are sure that once you use it, you will keep using it again because of the comfort it provides. It is also suitable and safe for regular use.
 
 
 
We use an FDA approved material that is soft and comfortable to the skin,  it would not cause any discomfort or bruise to the skin even after long hours of massaging. Besides that, after turning on the massaging robot, it will automatically adjust to fit the angle of the head, and solve any problem of the massage being too soft or too hard.
 
 
 
The head ring is made from all sorts of high quality material, it is also adjustable and made of light material. There are fixed slots for every adjustment to fit almost every size of the head. It also prevents the massage robot from slipping. 
 
 
Finding the right head size isn’t the easiest. After hundreds of simulation and commissioning, we manage to adjust LEROU Robot head ring according to appropriate measurements of different head sizes. 
 
 
 
At only 350grams, the ergonomically fit massaging robot will be positioned firmly at the head, with the head ring close to the back part of the head. The  weight will be spread across the entire head ring, so you won’t feel the weight. 
 
 
 
After folding, LEROU Robot can fit into your bag so that you can bring it on anywhere with you, even on the plane. Because it is so light and easy to wear, you can use it at work, while reading a book, or while taking a stroll in a park.
 
 
 
It rotates automatically in one direction, rotating 10 laps forward and 30 laps back. It is recommended that Each massage session is 7 minutes.
 
 

According to measurements, the loudest noise LEROU Robot’s motor can produce is about 43~44db, which is still all right for human ears. The low noise and powerful motor will provide you ultimate comfort, so where it whenever you want.

 
We collaborate with one of the best manufacturers to create our motor. It is a customized motor made according to our company’s high standards through research and development. After three years of numerous researches, product testing and alterations, we have developed the powerful and precision gearmotor. Although our motor is only 26 grams, it could handle a mass of 1175 grams, which is 45 times heavier! And at the same time, the noise doesn’t increase or change. On the same terms, we are the one and only motor that could achieve this in the world. Of course, other motors are able to similar to our performance and quality, but they cost more than $200. But, our LEROU Robot needs two of these motors, and even though it is the reason why we’re expensive, we are launching it at an early bird price on Kickstarter for only $169.
 
When we run the performance and endurance tests, our no-load test rig runs, can run more than 60,000 minutes or 1,000 hours. When testing the machine on people's heads. It is able to run for more than 12,000 minutes or 200 hours. High-quality products is our eternal pursuit.

450mAh battery allows LEROU Robot to run for 3 hours straight, and if under the standby mode, it could last up to 10 hours. The massaging robot consumes less energy, and we highly recommend users to use it for 7minutes.

 

 

 

We use high quality pc+abs material for the shell of LEROU. There is a manganese steel ring inside the back ring of the product. We use steel ring to keep the massager robot clamping force stable and not shrink. The part close to the head will be made of protein like leather and sponge. 

LEROU is very simple and convenient to use, you can check the total working time of the massaging robot through the LED Display. Press the button for 3 secs to start or shut off the massaging robot. 

Size: 7.6x7.2x2.6inch / 192.04 X 184 X67.11mm  

Weight: 350g

Power: 3W Running time : 3H 

Charging duration: 2H

Battery type: Lithium-ion battery

Battery capacity: 450mA 

Voltage: 3V (DC) 

Body material: PC+ABS edible silica gel, protein skin leather and sponge, aluminum alloy metal

 

 

 

  •  LEROU Massager
  • TYPE-C Charging Cable
  • Storage Bag

 Currently, we have finished the molds design and develpment of all ptoducts, and we are doing product testing on the small batch. It is expected that after the campaign ends in around March, we would be able to ship the goods and offer free shipping worldwide to all backers that supported us, we will be fulling orders from the United States, China, Canada and Hong Kong, But  that if you live outside of those regions, you may be responsible for local duties , fees and taxes .

Shenzhen Aiwan Industrial Design Co., Ltd., is a company with independent intellectual property rights and independent creativity. We developed the world's first temple massager brand – LEROU.  We also have a professional R & D team. In order to pursue the perfect product and functional experience, we spend more than 4 years to make this awesome massager - LEROU. Our aim is to let people around the world enjoy the comfort from LEROU.

 We are grateful for a great platform like Kickstarter that gives ordinary people a chance to change lives. We also appreciate all the kind backers that trusted us to complete this campaign. 

 

 Want to write about us? Use our Media Kit.

story:
Ok here's my deal.  My name is John and I recently came to a realization. 

   I've  finally had enough of spending my time and efforts building a business for someone else.  I'm tired of seeing others enjoy the fruits of my labor. 

   I want to do something that I enjoy doing, that has the potential to provide a decent income for me and my family while still allowing for some time to LIVE.

 I want my own business but don't have an extra million laying around to buy a McDonalds franchise.

I'm not a multi-level guy so Amway and such are out. 

Here's what I came up with;

   I decided the only way to get what I wanted was to create it myself.  

   I knew I had to develop a business that would provide a valuable and beneficial service within a large but focused market. I knew I wanted the business to be tech based but rooted in a recreational industry.  I wanted a business that would allow me the flexibility to work from home or while on the road but was not constrained by location or in it's growth potential.
 
   Thus the 321Golf concept was born. 

   I thought.

   I researched.

   I worked. 

   I developed state of the art technology that easily and simply connects golf courses with golfers in real time via cloud based servers and a smart phone based app.

It's flipping brilliant. 

It puts all the golf courses in the U.S., and their marketing info in one place.....The palm of your hand! 


The benefit to golfers 

  The 321Golf app is free to download for golfers and uses geo-locating and mapping technology to display courses near the user. While at home, traveling or vacationing the 321Golf app can be used as a resource to locate and contact nearby golf courses.

   The321Golf app has the location and contact information on 95% of all golf courses in the United States. These courses are clearly identified by a red push pin graphic.  Pushpins can be tapped to display course name, location and phone number.    Additionally  courses participating in the 321Golf program  will be displayed with a green push pin clearly identifying them as having active or ongoing deals or specials.  

   All deals or incentives displayed on the 321Golf app are prescheduled to disappear at the end of the day.  This assures golfers that all displayed information is live and current. All the information is right at the golfer's fingertips . Courses can be dialed directly from within the app and golfers can take advantage of specials, open tee times, or other incentives from participating courses.

The benefit to the Golf Courses 

  Golf Courses can use the downloadable 321Golf "pro-dashboard" to instantly feed information from their golf course directly to the 321Golf app.  Courses or course pros can "live post" information on available tee times, upcoming events, specials and/or lessons right from their computer, tablet or smart phone.  

  The 321 dashboard is quick, easy and affordable to use. Courses can preload the software with messages on upcoming specials or events thus streamlining the management of their marketing campaigns. The 321Golf pro-dashboard provides golf courses with a very cost effective marketing medium. It also provides a much more versatile alternative to clunky and expensive platforms such as Golfnow.com. 

  All golf courses carry vacancies on their tee sheets, offer specials or incentives for off times, and advertise tournaments, lessons or events.  321Golf instantly pushes that information directly from the course right into the hands of local or visiting golfers.

Use of Proceeds

  321Golf is raising $25,000 for continued development and initial marketing. The ios (iphone) version of 321Golf is completed and  currently available on the itunes app store,  The android version is under development and nearing  completion. The proceeds of our indiegogo campaign will fund completion of the app for android users as well as to cover initial marketing costs.  Further development includes the addition of special features such as in-app purchases and dashboard modifications and upgrades.
story_txt:
Ok here's my deal.  My name is John and I recently came to a realization.     I've  finally had enough of spending my time and efforts building a business for someone else.  I'm tired of seeing others enjoy the fruits of my labor.     I want to do something that I enjoy doing, that has the potential to provide a decent income for me and my family while still allowing for some time to LIVE.  I want my own business but don't have an extra million laying around to buy a McDonalds franchise.I'm not a multi-level guy so Amway and such are out.  Here's what I came up with;   I decided the only way to get what I wanted was to create it myself.     I knew I had to develop a business that would provide a valuable and beneficial service within a large but focused market. I knew I wanted the business to be tech based but rooted in a recreational industry.  I wanted a business that would allow me the flexibility to work from home or while on the road but was not constrained by location or in it's growth potential.     Thus the 321Golf concept was born.    I thought.   I researched.   I worked.    I developed state of the art technology that easily and simply connects golf courses with golfers in real time via cloud based servers and a smart phone based app. It's flipping brilliant.  It puts all the golf courses in the U.S., and their marketing info in one place.....The palm of your hand!  The benefit to golfers  

  The 321Golf app is free to download for golfers and uses geo-locating and mapping technology to display courses near the user. While at home, traveling or vacationing the 321Golf app can be used as a resource to locate and contact nearby golf courses.
   The321Golf app has the location and contact information on 95% of all golf courses in the United States. These courses are clearly identified by a red push pin graphic.  Pushpins can be tapped to display course name, location and phone number.    Additionally  courses participating in the 321Golf program  will be displayed with a green push pin clearly identifying them as having active or ongoing deals or specials.  
   All deals or incentives displayed on the 321Golf app are prescheduled to disappear at the end of the day.  This assures golfers that all displayed information is live and current. All the information is right at the golfer's fingertips . Courses can be dialed directly from within the app and golfers can take advantage of specials, open tee times, or other incentives from participating courses. 

The benefit to the Golf Courses 
  Golf Courses can use the downloadable 321Golf "pro-dashboard" to instantly feed information from their golf course directly to the 321Golf app.  Courses or course pros can "live post" information on available tee times, upcoming events, specials and/or lessons right from their computer, tablet or smart phone.  
  The 321 dashboard is quick, easy and affordable to use. Courses can preload the software with messages on upcoming specials or events thus streamlining the management of their marketing campaigns. The 321Golf pro-dashboard provides golf courses with a very cost effective marketing medium. It also provides a much more versatile alternative to clunky and expensive platforms such as Golfnow.com. 
  All golf courses carry vacancies on their tee sheets, offer specials or incentives for off times, and advertise tournaments, lessons or events.  321Golf instantly pushes that information directly from the course right into the hands of local or visiting golfers.

Use of Proceeds
  321Golf is raising $25,000 for continued development and initial marketing. The ios (iphone) version of 321Golf is completed and  currently available on the itunes app store,  The android version is under development and nearing  completion. The proceeds of our indiegogo campaign will fund completion of the app for android users as well as to cover initial marketing costs.  Further development includes the addition of special features such as in-app purchases and dashboard modifications and upgrades.

story:
EMERGENCY APPEAL 4 – GAZA WAR 2014

#EMGAZA4

Disabled & Malnutrition

EMGAZA appeals founded to help Gaza’s disabilities due to the ongoing Israeli blocked and immense humanitarian situation.

We started our humanitarian activities in the last Israeli genocide to help those who are in need and got affected directly (individuals & Non-profit Organizations)

Since then we successfully delivered aids (Incontinence pads, Medicines, Medical equipment and first aid kits) to many Local NGOs and hospitals scattered in the Gaza strip.

We've done 3 appeals with this purpose and here is what we have achieved so far:  

  • 12 local NGOs involved.
  • +3000 disabled got a quick help
  •  3 hospitals got medicines and first aid kits.

Check our video reports of the previous appeals.


Our humor to continue helping Disabilities won’t stop here, thus why we are starting the 4th appeal since the needs are high and so many disabled are relying on our aids.

#EMGAZA4 Goals

In this appeal we have two goals to hit.

  • Helping Gaza’s disabilities with Incontinence pads
  • Helping disabled who have malnutrition, especially children with providing Multivitamins (Syrup & Tablets).

Statistics – Gaza strip

Malnutrition

According to the Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics, 10.7 %  of Gazan children aged under five are now suffering stunted growth due to chronic malnutrition.  The main reasons are

  •  Gaza Strip does not have sufficient natural food resources.
  •  Gaza cannot grow the variety of fruit and vegetables needed in order to  provide children a well-balanced diet.
  •  Gaza depends on food imports, but the food table in the Gaza Strip is now severely deficient because of the siege and closure.

Disabilities

According to the definition that Handicap International and the World Health Organization uses includes the functional, the capacity of people to perform daily tasks on their own 10 to 15 % of Gaza’s population are in a disability situation.

PLAN

  • We've got a good database which involves so many NGOs and hospitals which deal with such conditions, and we've managed that our aid will be distributed to the dedicated individuals through them.
  • We will buy the needed items from Gaza & West Bank drug stores which will be delivered straight away to the dedicated individuals.

EMGAZA Appeals's Strategy

-  BDS

We as a team of EMGAZA adopt BDS (Boycott, Divestment and Sanction) philosophy by boycotting the Israeli goods and buying instead made in Palestine products. We did/do buy medicines from the Palestinian medical factories – West Bank.

-  ECONOMY 

By buying the Palestinian products (Medicines),  we will refresh some drug store’s  business as well as improve the Palestinian economy since its affected by Israeli siege and International Aids.

- INDEPENDENT

We as a team don’t follow or endorse any political party. We believe in Palestine and all Palestinians.

EMGAZA TEAM

We are a group of Pharmacists based on the Gaza strip, have a high attitude for a humanitarian work and we’re all working as volunteers. We enjoy helping our people and satisfied to draw a smile on so many sad faces and light up their hope.

EMGAZA Appeals Manager & Director.

I’d like to thank everyone who donated and supported our appeals so far. Thanks for a trust in me and thanks for your understanding my people’s suffering.

Much love & respect to whom are working so hard to rise awareness about Palestine and its hardships. Freedom will come soon, and all this pain will be eased.

Keep your hard work brothers and sisters, May Allah (God) reward your good deeds and grant you a long healthy life.

Dr. Hani Siliman Salamah

story:
Help Us Raise The Funds To Get Alan Back On His Bike

Our previous fund raising efforts allowed Alan to visit Italy and race in the Di Di Cup.

Alan Kempster started riding motor bikes in his teens and began racing  when he was 20 years old, but his racing career was cut horribly short just eight years later.

Twenty three years ago Alan was involved in a hit and run road accident that left him without an arm and a leg.

Despite his injuries, Alan was committed to his rehabilitation and always wanted to get back on the bike and in 2009 he bought a Kawasaki 400 race bike and modified the controls himself to enable him to ride again. Simply riding on tracks was not enough for Alan and he decided to have a go at racing once again. 

There is no ‘disabled class’ for motorcycle racing, so Alan races against able-bodied competitors and is well known and respected among his peers on the circuit.

It takes some $20,000 per year to compete in race meetings, with money needed for repairs, maintenance and travel.  

Sadly, Alan can no longer race because his disability pension does not afford him the opportunity – he doesn’t need a hand out, he needs a hand up.

Help us raise the funds to get Alan back on his bike. Losing an arm and a leg didn’t stop Alan; please don’t let money stop him now!

Alan now spreads his message of living life to the full and getting on with it through his entertaining and personable manner. We invite you to meet Alan and share in his drive, resilience and love of life, and help him in his quest to continue being the best he can be.

story:
At the Foundation for Athletics Safety and Technology (FAST), we are dedicated to improving the safety and well being of athletes by providing state-of-the-art, preventative care, or potential life saving technology through charitable contributions. 

Our Vision:

To bring an end to reoccurring concussions and cases of Second Impact Syndrome in all sports!


What is Second Impact Syndrome (SIS)?

       


"WE CARE" Campaign Promise

Contributions to our WE CARE (Concussion Awareness Response Evaluation) campaign will go towards purchasing Sway Balance systems for at risk athletic programs. 


Let's take a closer look at Sway!

     


                   


Sway out performs the current technologies used to identify concussions


              




The FAST 90 Day Challenge!

Phase 1: (30 days)

The fundraising portion of our 90 day challenge is paramount to protecting our young athletes against serious concussion related injuries. We need to raise $800,000 to donate 500 Sway Balance Systems to 500 athletic programs nationwide.

What happens when we surpass our goal?
Donations raised beyond our goal will be used to purchase additional Sway balance systems for youth athletic programs. 

What happens if we don't hit our goal?
If this campaign ends before we are fully funded that will not stop us! We will acquire as many Sway systems as we can and move onto Phase 2. We will continue our fundraising on our website, www.fast.foundation.

Will I get my perks during Phase 1?
While all of our donors are important in supporting this cause, we must put the athletes who are at risk first. All perks will be shipped during Phase 3.

How to Donate to Fast!

      



Phase 2: (30 days)

In Phase 2 our fundraiser will be enrolling athletic programs into our WE CARE Program. All athletic programs enrolled will receive the Sway Balance Systems. 

How do I join @TheFastNation Physician Network?

To join our network of physicians please click here, http://www.fast.foundation/contact-us.html.  Contact us with your request and we will send you "TheFastNation Physician" request form.

How can I donate a Sway Balance System to my Alma mater?

We have specific a perk designed just for that purpose. When you contribute $1,600 or more you get to select the athletic program of your choice.

How to Apply for a Fast Grant! (Sway System)

     


Phase 3: (30 days)

Congratulations! We've made it!

By this point we have notified all of our WE CARE Program athletic programs that they are recipients of a Fast Donation.  Now it's time to get this revolutionary technology to the athletic programs who are at risk of SIS. We'll be working with each athletic program and Sway Medical LLC to make sure all coaching and training staff are familiar with the application. Most importantly, we will be linking licensed physicians to each athletic program.  If in the event an athlete gets a presumed concussion the proper steps will be taken to diagnose and treat the athlete.

Finally, IT'S TIME TO SHIP THE PERKS. All donor wristbands, sunglasses, water bottles, t-shirts, and other swag will be headed your way!

Other Ways You Can Help!

"Winning means you're willing to go longer, work harder, and give more than anyone else" - Vince Lombardi

  • Please share this Indiegogo campaign. Use the Sharing tool at the top of the campaign.
  • Let your friends know that you've donated!
  • Stay in touch. You can contact us anytime through our website at http://www.fast.foundation/contact-us.html.

From the entire Fast Family, thanks you for your support!

Let your friends know that you've donated!
Stay in touch. You can contact us anytime through our website at http://www.fast.foundation/contact-us.html.




From the entire Fast Family, thanks you for your support!

story:
Short Summary

When our son suffered a concussion, we did not understand the nuances of the recovery process. While he was stretched out on the couch missing weeks of school, I questioned if I was doing the right things. With the help of our doctor, we eventually got him back to high school, but by the time he graduated, he suffered two more sports related concussions. We quickly became “the experts” and friends came to us seeking advice and guidance. There is a great deal of information about what is a concussion, its signs and symptoms, even its prevention, but few websites delve into the complexities of post concussion management.  We saw that recovery is dependent on parents, and parents need to be empowered with accurate information to make the best decisions for their own child.

For the past 13 years, my husband and I have partnered together creating videos and developing websites. Recently, we have been specializing in patient and physician education and developed projects for Massachusetts General Hospital for Children, Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital, and Brigham and Women’s Hospital. We know first hand the power of videos in providing effective communications and we want to share the stories from parents, children, trainers, athletes, school nurses, and other medical professionals. Stories that will bring clarity and comfort to families who may feel isolated and worried. Stories that will also provide them with answers to help guide their decisions.

Our Team

We are fortunate to have Dr Neal McGrath, a nationally recognized neuropsychologist with over 10 plus years of experience treating concussed patients, overseeing our efforts. Lisa Paradis, Director of Brookline Recreation and organizer of the New England Youth Concussion Forum, is also part of our team helping us develop networks that will ensure this content will reach as many families as possible. Eli Davis, a communications major at UMASS Amherst, is responsible for all our social media.

Visit The Food Challenge Website

Dr. Wayne Shreffler, Director of the Food Allergy Center at MGH, wanted a way to show his patients what to expect at The Food Challenge. How do you take a five hour challenge, which is essentially patients sitting in a examining room waiting for an allergic reaction, and transform it into an interesting educational tool? We came up with the idea to interview parents and children before and after. What we discovered was that patients are passionate and eloquent, and could tell the story to other patients better than any narrated script could ever accomplish. We edited all the pieces into short videos based on pertinent topics. Then we built a website designed to be user friendly, allowing patients to easily find what they needed.



What We Need & What You Get

There are three separate facets to Connect2Concussion: excellent video, user-friendly website, and extensive networking to get the word out.

1 Video Production.

We have to find interesting people willing to tell their stories, then capture their content and edit it with skill and finesse so the video is also compelling and meaningful to watch. The more funds we raise, the more we can travel and the more stories we can collect.

2 Develop and Maintain a Website.

We plan on not only developing a website, but organizing this amazing and powerful content so that it is easy to use and easy to find information.

We also want to create a portal that will allow other organizations to display our content on their own website. We are working closely with National Recreation and Parks Association (NRPA) to offer their 42,000 affiliate members this option.

3 Get the word out

It makes no sense to build a website with great content if no one knows about it.

Eli, our social media expert, is working daily connecting us to people on facebook and twitter.

We are committed to networking to find similar organizations or youth sports teams to point them to our website or provide content to their own. We want to reach out to as many people and organizations as possible for either content or exposure.


Time and Expenses

We have the experience and the skill set to create high quality content and develop a significant platform for its delivery. All of the above requires a huge amount of time, professional expertise, and overhead.

If we raise funds ABOVE the minimal ask...

We can maintain the website (and social media) by adding new content and keeping it fresh and up-to-date.

We can also add functionality. It would be great if people could upload their own videos. This would allow people from all over the country to share their stories.

We can also collect and maintain links to viable resources such as medical facilities, relevant websites and published books.


The Impact

Before embarking on this endeavor, we met and spoke to many people. Parents who had experienced the difficulties surrounding recovery were excited to learn about this project. They know even under the best of circumstances, the tremendous amount of stress this injury places on a family. Having a place to go for support and encouragement can be significant to a everyone involved.

Medical professionals have also voiced enthusiasm towards our project. It would mean they could direct their patients to a website that would answer many of the their basic questions and common concerns, freeing up valuable time for their staff.


Risks & Challenges

This project is low risk. We have a great deal of experience with video production and website development. We have completed a similar project at Massachusetts General Hospital for Children (See above). Dr Neal McGrath, our thought leader and Clinical Director at New England Sports in Boston, is a nationally recognized neuropsychologist in the area of sports concussion. He has practiced in the Boston area for the last 30 years, specializing in the evaluation and rehabilitation of traumatic brain injuries. Lisa Paradis is a Recreation Director committed to educating families on post-concussion recovery. She organized the New England Youth Concussion Forum this past May. Her father Sheldon Paradis, a former college football player, donated his brain to Boston University’s Center for Traumatic Encephalopathy through the Sports Legacy Institute after his death in 2008.

Our only challenge is raising enough funds so we can devote the time to produce videos, develop a website, and reach out to organizations to link to us and/or provide our content on their own website.


More about our Perks

All donations, regardless of amount, will be acknowledged on the website and you will receive a personal thank you note.


$5,000
2 Red Sox tickets PLUS on the field watching batting practice. Priceless.



$1,000
2 CLUB SEATS PLUS VIP passes for on the field for team warm ups.

Revs will be battling Seattle Sounders FC for the MLS Cup Championship on Dec 7







Visit City Sports online to see their selection of athletic apparel, shoes and more!



The staff at Eureka! believe that thinking is fun. By engaging in mentally challenging and enjoyable activities, individuals of any age can enjoy lasting benefits and improve different aspects of their mental landscape. To that end, Eureka has donated a variety of mechanical puzzles to give as perks for contributions of $75. Eureka! has put together a program which highlights the connections between different mental or brain activities and games or puzzles. Read more.


Everyone making a donation will be acknowledged on our website.



Other Ways You Can Help

Connect us to your friends, family, and colleagues. Everyone knows someone who has had a concussion. We are looking for people who would like to share their story. Most importantly, we need people to help us network with individuals and organizations. Help us get the word out so we can help families get their children safely back to school and back to play.

Before embarking on this endeavor, we met and spoke to many people. Parents who had experienced the difficulties surrounding recovery were excited to learn about this project. They know even under the best of circumstances, the tremendous amount of stress this injury places on a family. Having a place to go for support and encouragement can be significant to a everyone involved.
Medical professionals have also voiced enthusiasm towards our project. It would mean they could direct their patients to a website that would answer many of the their basic questions and common concerns, freeing up valuable time for their staff.
Risks & Challenges
This project is low risk. We have a great deal of experience with video production and website development. We have completed a similar project at Massachusetts General Hospital for Children (See above). Dr Neal McGrath, our thought leader and Clinical Director at New England Sports in Boston, is a nationally recognized neuropsychologist in the area of sports concussion. He has practiced in the Boston area for the last 30 years, specializing in the evaluation and rehabilitation of traumatic brain injuries. Lisa Paradis is a Recreation Director committed to educating families on post-concussion recovery. She organized the New England Youth Concussion Forum this past May. Her father Sheldon Paradis, a former college football player, donated his brain to Boston University’s Center for Traumatic Encephalopathy through the Sports Legacy Institute after his death in 2008.Our only challenge is raising enough funds so we can devote the time to produce videos, develop a website, and reach out to organizations to link to us and/or provide our content on their own website.More about our PerksAll donations, regardless of amount, will be acknowledged on the website and you will receive a personal thank you note.


$5,0002 Red Sox tickets PLUS on the field watching batting practice. Priceless.





$1,0002 CLUB SEATS PLUS VIP passes for on the field for team warm ups.
Revs will be battling Seattle Sounders FC for the MLS Cup Championship on Dec 7








Visit City Sports online to see their selection of athletic apparel, shoes and more!



The staff at Eureka! believe that thinking is fun. By engaging in mentally challenging and enjoyable activities, individuals of any age can enjoy lasting benefits and improve different aspects of their mental landscape. To that end, Eureka has donated a variety of mechanical puzzles to give as perks for contributions of $75. Eureka! has put together a program which highlights the connections between different mental or brain activities and games or puzzles. Read more.





Everyone making a donation will be acknowledged on our website.


Other Ways You Can Help
Connect us to your friends, family, and colleagues. Everyone knows someone who has had a concussion. We are looking for people who would like to share their story. Most importantly, we need people to help us network with individuals and organizations. Help us get the word out so we can help families get their children safely back to school and back to play.

story:
Say hello to Solitaire - the wireless, interactive, and stylish earbud that is designed to change the way ear technology looks forever! 

Too busy to talk? Too much to do? Can't listen to music on your time? Too many people to see? Tune on to your music and talk to your friends; Solitaire keeps you tuned in for hours. 

As Seen In

The Solitaire Earbud

Does your earbud look like a brick on your ear? This is the earbud for you! The Solitaire finally lets you look the way you want to when talking or listening to your music. It lets you have a hands-free experience wherever you are. It can connect to more then one device, it's as light as a feather, plus it does all this without you having to recharge it every hour.

Features

Solitaire features cutting edge microchip technologies, a voice detecting microphone, and CVC noise reduction capabilities to provide a truly personal listening experience. 


Dual Connectivity

Who knew such a small earbud could hold such great power? Solitaire comes equipped with smart Bluetooth capabilities, so you can now use two phones at once! 

Battery Level?

If you have an iPhone you can always see how long you have until you need to hit the plug. Never have your music die on you again.


What's All The Hype About?

Are you sick of the dull, grey earbuds everyone uses to talk with? Do you get frustrated with headsets that get in the way of what you actually want to do? Do you get so absolutely tired of wires that they give you headaches, keep you tied to your phone, and force you to untangle a mess? 

Help Make It Happen

Why Solitaire?

What earbud does not have wires, is not heavy, looks stylish, and actually looks like it is made in the 21st century? Imagine wearing a heavy, tangled “standard” earbud…It’s not the best. Now imagine wearing an earbud that is lighter than a feather, unique in shape, has absolutely no wires, and looks stylish. Usually people like to look “cool” and want to express who they are. You can do this with basically everything except for your earbuds. They’re supposed to be ear “buds” and help your ears out, not burden them with something heavy and ugly! That's why you need Solitaire.

Do you want to keep the old stuff around forever?

CVC & Bluetooth



The Solitaire uses amazing CVC nose cancellation & Bluetooth technologies to create a truly fun and unique experience. 

Get your Solitaire in four different packages. Two Solitaires are better than one! If you have a family that desires a Solitaire for every member, or if you just would love one for yourself, we've got you covered. 

What Are The Colors?

Have you seen the colors? 

Solitaire is not limited to just grey or white, unlike many of your other earbuds on the market. This is why we wanted to make a true piece of art - to let you choose instead of having it chosen for you!

Solitaire History

You know we've come a long way; this is the proof. After our Indiegogo campaign, our number one priority is to get you your solitaire. 

Our Story

Everyone loves great stories, and ours is a simple one. Has anyone ever asked, "Why aren’t there earbuds that actually help me look good?” Earbuds are usually ugly, they don’t go with your style, and they look kind of like a computer chip on your ear. Come on! Imagine if people saw you and said, “WOW! Where did you get that; I’ve never seen it before?” With almost every earbud currently out there, you won’t get this response. That’s why we thought of Solitaire - so people can actually wear an earbud that looks good! Not one that looks old and “normal”. Besides, do you want to look “normal”? Probably not. Solitaire is inspiring and is changing the way people are thinking about earbuds! Anyway, like I said, people love great stories, and ours is a simple one. 

Packaging & i3 Prototype

Risks and Challenges

Risks and challenges: You always have a risk to take or a challenge to overcome. We are working with many individuals to make the Solitaire a reality for you; unfortunately, this always comes with unexpected delays and issues.

Work is going as fast as possible to get all things in order. The Solitaire has a few further adjustments to make, and shipping worldwide is not an easy challenge. Indiegogo is only just the beginning of our final journey! There are still a few stepping stones, but don’t worry, the Solitaire will be in your hands before you know it. With your help, we will be able to make the vision a reality.

Manufacturing: The tooling required to manufacture a product of such a small size is expensive. Each Solitaire is hand assembled, requiring a careful yet difficult tooling process. We are working directly with our manufacturerers to insure a prompt delivery that is of the best quality.

Product Adjustments: As the Solitaire is geared up for full scale production, there will be adjustments made. The software has been tested and tested again, but there will probably be a few more unexpected bugs. We want all the kinks out before the Solitaire is in your ear!

Fulfillment: Sometimes things just don’t go according to plan: a supplier misses a shipping deadline, a machine breaks down, or a product shipment is lost. We are directly managing and working with manufacturers who have many years of experience under their belts. There is always a surprise, so we are doing our best to navigate through the rough waters. 

A Charitable Mention

The Solitaire is paired up with three charities! Heifer International, Pencils Of Promise, and A Human Project. This is because we believe we all should give back and help those who aren't as fortunate. So every time you order a Solitaire and support the campaign, $5 (approximately 8.5%) automatically is dedicated to one of these three nonprofits. We are dedicated to providing you with an awesome earbud while changing the world in the process! 

Let's Make A Difference!

Thank you!

Thank you for your time and support!



FAQs

Q. What is it?

A. Technically speaking, Solitaire is a Bluetooth earbud that doubles as a receiver for a phone and a music player.

Q. What is the connection range?

A. The connection range is 30ft, or 10m (without obstacles). For best connection, it is recommended to keep your phone or device on the same side of your body as the earbud.

Q. How long is the battery life?

A. Music time: up to four hours

  Talk time: about eight hours

Q. What is the weight?

A. The weight is 6.8g or 0.015 lb!

Q. When will it ship?

A. The solitaire will begin shipping once the manufacturing process is worked out and logistics are planned. You should expect shipping to begin, at the latest, in July 2016. (You will be sent email updates informing you of the progress. Please, also refer to the product timeline above).

Q. When will you receive your order?

A. You will receive your Solitaire five to thirty days after shipment begins.

Q. How much is shipping?

A. Shipping is included in your price

Q. What are the dimensions?

A. The dimensions are 1.5x1 in.  

Q. What colors are available?

A. It comes in:  White with blue, Black with red, White with caramel/amber, and Black with silver.

Q. Can you get a custom color?

A. No, at the moment we are only offering the colors above

Q. How many can you connect to with one device at once?

A. You can connect to as many as you would like. However, music and phone calls will only stream to one solitaire at a time.

Q. How long is the standby battery life?

A. The standby battery life is up to 80 hours!

Q. How do you connect to it?

A. Pairing steps:

Before using the headset, it must be paired to cell phones or a device with Bluetooth. Pairing means building a connection between Bluetooth devices (like cell phones or computers) and the earbud so that they can remember the PI of each other.

1. Make sure the headset is turned off before pairing.
2. Press the “Multi-function Button” for 5-10 seconds until the LED indicator shines in red and blue alternately and the voice prompt says “pairing”. Now it is in pairing mode.
3. Make sure the Bluetooth is on, and click “search” (For more information about Bluetooth searching function, please refer to the cell phone manual).
4. If your Solitaire was identified, click “Solitaire” to pair.
5. If it needs a password, please input “0000” (four zeros).
Some cell phones may need you to connect it with the headset after pairing, please refer to cell phone manual for more information.
If it paired successfully, “Solitaire” will be on the list of your paired devices.

Q. How do you make calls with it?

A. You can call manually with your phone; the conversation will be transmitted to your earbud.

Q. Does it play music?

A. Yes, whatever music you want.

Q. How big is the packaging?

A. The packaging dimensions depend on your order. The more you order the larger the packaging.

Size of individual package (CM):14.2x7.8x4.5
size of carton (CM):42x31x26

Q. How much does the package weigh?

A. The package weighs, on average, 4 ounces.

Q. What comes with your Solitaire?

A. With the Solitaire, you get: a charging cord, an additional wired earbud, an ear hook, an extra silicone ear piece, a carrying case, a manual, and the packaging.

Q. Does it receive software updates?

A. No

Q. What is the operating temperature?

A. 14°F to 140°F, or -10°c to 60°C

Q. What is the transmission power?

A. Class 2

Q. What phones can you use it with?

A. It is fully compatible with all smart phone devices. As long as your smart phone, tablet, or laptop/computer has Bluetooth version 4.0, the Solitaire can connect with 98% of all devices.

Q. How loud does it get?

A. It gets as loud as the average Apple headphones.

Q. How long is the charging cord?

A. The cord is 16 inches long.

Q. What do you charge it from?

A. You can charge it from any USB port.

Q. Does it have buttons?

A. Yes, it has one button on the front side called the “Multifunction Button”.

Q. What is the “Multifunction Button”?

A. The “Multifunction Button” allows you to pause music, decline or take a call with a quick press, and it is the on/off button.

See more FAQ for details of how to take calls.

Q. Is there a replacement battery?

A. As of now, no there is not. Possible future models may have this feature.

Q. Are there replacement parts?

A.  The only replacement part that the Solitaire comes with is a silicone earpiece.

Q. Does it have a warranty?

A. Since this is our first model, no.

Q. Do you get a user’s manual?

A. Yes, there is a user’s manual included in the packaging.

Q. How does it work?

A. The Solitaire connects to your device via Bluetooth. It has one “Multifunction Button" on the front side, and is completely wireless!

Q. What is Bluetooth?

A. Bluetooth is a standard utilization for the short-range wireless interconnection of cellular phones, computers, and other electronic devices.

The Solitaire comes equipped with Bluetooth version 4.1!

Q. Can you connect two to the same device?

A. Yes, but only one Solitaire will stream music at a time.

Q. Can it connect with a computer?

A. Yes, if the computer comes equipped with Bluetooth.

Q. Can you have a replacement rubber earpiece?

A. Yes, you can order one on the perks list above. It also comes with an extra ear piece, too!

Q. What is crowdfunding?

A. Crowdfunding is the practice of funding a project or venture by raising small amounts of money from a large number of people, typically via the Internet.

Q. What is Indiegogo?

A. You can look in the Indiegogo’s “about us” link, but it is the largest crowdfunding website in the world!

Q. Are there refunds?

A. Yes! There is a 100% money back guarantee until May 26, 2016 through Indiegog! However, once shipment begins, we at Solitaire may offer a conditional money back guarantee.

Q. Can you have a discount?

A. Of course!!!! If you made it to the early bird spots you have a HUGE DISCOUNT! If not then don’t worry, you are still getting up to 35% off suggested retail!!!!

Q. How strong is it?

A. Solitaire may look like a diamond, but it’s not quite that strong. It is recommended to treat the Solitaire as you would any other electronic device.

Q. Is it water resistant?

A. No it is not. It is recommended to keep the Solitaire in a dry environment. (Not meant for athletic purposes)

Q. When was this company founded?

A. Tune-on was founded in 2014 by Logan Bundy, who currently resides in Wichita KS, USA.

Since then, Tune-on has been formally incorporated as of late 2015.

Q. Where is the product manufactured?

A. The Solitaire will be manufactured in China until U.S. manufacturers become available to work with after our crowdfunding campaign.

Q. Will there be future versions?

A. Possibly, if you help us get off the ground, future products are likely.

Q. Is there anything like it on the market?

A. Aesthetically, no. However, “normal” earbuds are everywhere!

Q. What happens if my product breaks?

A. If your product breaks up to 4 months after purchase, then you are entitled to a full refund.

Q. What do you do if your product is damaged during shipping?

A. If your Solitaire is damaged during shipping, you need to contact customer support via email or through our Indiegogo campaign. To receive compensation for damaged goods, you will be required to take a photo of the issue as soon as you discover there is one (Due to shipping). Software problems are not covered for any damaged goods caused by shipping.

Q. What charities get money from this campaign?

A. We are donating $5 (approximately 8.5%) of every sale to three charities. These charities are: Pencils of Promise, A Human project, and Heifer Foundation.

Tune-on does not only want to produce an amazing earbud, but we also want to help those in need around the world. It’s the least we can do!

Q. Where can it ship to?

A. The Solitaire ships worldwide. See your local government regulation and policies for Bluetooth devices and their specific information if you’re not sure.

Q. Can you order in bulk?

A. Yes, you have the option for two bulk packages above.

Q. How do you tell if it is charging?

A. When the Solitaire is plugged into a USB power outlet, it will light up red. Once the Solitaire has a full charge you will see it light up blue, indicating a full charge.

Q. How do you know when to charge it?

A. If the Solitaire is connected to an iPhone or other compatible device, you can find a second battery display.

Q. How long does it take to charge?

A. Less than 2 hours!

Q. What do the LEDs tell you?

A. The LEDs tell you what the Solitaire is currently doing. If the LEDs begin to flash red every five seconds, this indicates low battery. They will flash for every call you revive, and when you are pairing and/or charging your Solitaire.

Q. Is it voice activated?

A. Yes, it is optional. To answer an incoming call, you say “yes”. To decline a call, say “no”. When you receive a call, the voice prompt will announce the caller ID number; you can answer verbally only after the number has been announced.

Q. What do you say to voice call someone?

A. Make sure that your phone’s voice control function is on, and it knows your voice.

Press the “Multifunction Button” for one second, after that you can play/pause music, and make calls, etc.

Q. How do you accept an incoming call?

A. To answer verbally, say “yes” right after the voice prompt announces the caller ID. Alternatively, you can answer manually.

Q. How do you decline a call or hang up?

A. To decline a call, you can verbally say “no” after the caller ID has been announced. Or you can decline manually.

To hang up on a current call, press the end call button on your phone, or press the “Multifunction Button” once.

Q. How do you put someone on hold?

A. To put someone on hold, you click the “Multifunction Button” once someone new is calling.

To end the last call and answer the new call, you press the “Multifunction Button” quickly two times.

Q. How do you re-dial the last phone call?

A. When the Solitaire is on standby mode, double click the “Multifunction Button” to re-dial the last call.

Q. How do you mute the call?

A. To mute a call while talking, double click the “Multifunction Button”.

Q. How do you shift between your Solitaire and your cell phone for a phone call?

A. When on the phone call, press the “Multifunction Button” for one second, and you will hear a “toot” sound from Solitaire.

Q. Where can you use it?

A. You can use Solitaire anywhere you are allowed to with the exception of on a plane, unless granted permission, or under water.

Q. Does it come with a storage case?

A. YES!!!

Q. How big is the storage case?

A. The storage case is 3.5 Inches in diameter, and 1 inch thick.

Q. Can you get an additional storage case?

A. Yes!! Just add the perk above.

Q. Can it be worn with earrings?

A. Yes, in most cases.

Q. What is it called in the menu, when connecting it to your device?

A. It is called “Solitaire”!

Q. Can I buy after the campaign is over?

A. If the campaign meets its goal, yes!

Q. What happens if the campaign is not successful?

A. If the campaign is not successful and you are a contributor, you will receive a full refund right away! 

Legal Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."



Copyright © Tune-on . All rights reserved.
