user’s manual? 
A. Yes, there is a user’s manual included in the
packaging. 
Q. How does it
work?
A. The Solitaire connects to your device via Bluetooth.
It has one “Multifunction Button" on the front side, and is completely
wireless!
Q. What is
Bluetooth? 
A. Bluetooth is a standard utilization for the
short-range wireless interconnection of cellular phones, computers, and other
electronic devices. 
The Solitaire comes equipped with Bluetooth version
4.1!
Q. Can you
connect two to the same device? 
A. Yes, but only one Solitaire will stream music at a
time. 
Q. Can it
connect with a computer? 
A. Yes, if the computer comes equipped with Bluetooth.
Q. Can you have
a replacement rubber earpiece? 
A. Yes, you can order one on the perks list above. It
also comes with an extra ear piece, too!
Q. What is
crowdfunding? 
A. Crowdfunding is the practice of funding a project or
venture by raising small amounts of money from a large number of people,
typically via the Internet.
Q. What is
Indiegogo?
A. You can look in the Indiegogo’s “about us” link, but
it is the largest crowdfunding website in the world! 
Q. Are there
refunds?
A. Yes! There is a 100% money back guarantee until May 26, 2016 through Indiegog! However, once shipment begins, we at Solitaire may offer a conditional money back guarantee.
Q. Can you have
a discount?
A. Of course!!!! If you made it to the early bird spots
you have a HUGE DISCOUNT! If not then don’t worry, you are still getting up to
35% off suggested retail!!!! 
Q. How strong is
it?
A. Solitaire may look like a diamond, but it’s not
quite that strong. It is recommended to treat the Solitaire as you would any
other electronic device. 
Q. Is it water
resistant?
A. No it is not. It is recommended to keep the
Solitaire in a dry environment. (Not meant for athletic purposes)
Q. When was this
company founded?
A. Tune-on was founded in 2014 by Logan Bundy, who
currently resides in Wichita KS, USA. 
Since then, Tune-on has been formally incorporated as
of late 2015. 
Q. Where is the
product manufactured?
A. The Solitaire will be manufactured in China until
U.S. manufacturers become available to work with after our crowdfunding
campaign. 
Q. Will there be
future versions?
A. Possibly, if you help us get off the ground, future
products are likely. 
Q. Is there
anything like it on the market?
A. Aesthetically, no. However, “normal” earbuds are
everywhere! 
Q. What happens
if my product breaks?
A. If your product breaks up to 4 months after
purchase, then you are entitled to a full refund. 
Q. What do you
do if your product is damaged during shipping? 
A. If your Solitaire is damaged during shipping, you
need to contact customer support via email or through our Indiegogo campaign.
To receive compensation for damaged goods, you will be required to take a photo
of the issue as soon as you discover there is one (Due to shipping). Software
problems are not covered for any damaged goods caused by shipping. 
Q. What
charities get money from this campaign? 
A. We are donating $5 (approximately 8.5%) of every sale to three charities.
These charities are: Pencils of Promise, A Human project, and Heifer
Foundation.
Tune-on does not only want to produce an amazing
earbud, but we also want to help those in need around the world. It’s the least
we can do!
Q. Where can it
ship to?
A. The Solitaire ships worldwide. See your local
government regulation and policies for Bluetooth devices and their specific
information if you’re not sure. 
Q. Can you order
in bulk? 
A. Yes, you have the option for two bulk packages
above.
Q. How do you
tell if it is charging?
A. When the Solitaire is plugged into a USB power
outlet, it will light up red. Once the Solitaire has a full charge you will see
it light up blue, indicating a full charge. 
Q. How do you
know when to charge it?
A. If the Solitaire is connected to an iPhone or other
compatible device, you can find a second battery display.
Q. How long does
it take to charge?
A. Less than 2 hours!
Q. What do the
LEDs tell you?
A. The LEDs tell you what the Solitaire is currently
doing. If the LEDs begin to flash red every five seconds, this indicates low
battery. They will flash for every call you revive, and when you are pairing
and/or charging your Solitaire. 
Q. Is it voice
activated?
A. Yes, it is optional. To answer an incoming call, you
say “yes”. To decline a call, say “no”. When you receive a call, the voice
prompt will announce the caller ID number; you can answer verbally only after
the number has been announced. 
Q. What do you
say to voice call someone?
A. Make sure that your phone’s voice control function
is on, and it knows your voice. 
Press the “Multifunction Button” for one second, after
that you can play/pause music, and make calls, etc. 
Q. How do you
accept an incoming call?
A. To answer verbally, say “yes” right after the voice prompt announces the caller ID. Alternatively, you can answer manually. 
Q. How do you
decline a call or hang up?
A. To decline a call, you can verbally say “no” after
the caller ID has been announced. Or you can decline manually. 
To hang up on a current call, press the end call button
on your phone, or press the “Multifunction Button” once. 
Q. How do you
put someone on hold? 
A. To put someone on hold, you click the “Multifunction
Button” once someone new is calling. 
To end the last call and answer the new call, you press
the “Multifunction Button” quickly two times. 
Q. How do you
re-dial the last phone call? 
A. When the Solitaire is on standby mode, double click
the “Multifunction Button” to re-dial the last call. 
Q. How do you
mute the call?
A. To mute a call while talking, double click the
“Multifunction Button”. 
Q. How
do you shift between your Solitaire and your cell phone for a phone call? 
A. When on the phone call, press the
“Multifunction Button” for one second, and you will hear a “toot” sound from
Solitaire.
Q. Where can you
use it?
A. You can use Solitaire anywhere you are allowed to with
the exception of on a plane, unless granted permission, or under water. 
Q. Does it come
with a storage case?
A. YES!!! 
Q. How big is
the storage case?
A. The storage case is 3.5 Inches in diameter, and 1
inch thick. 
Q. Can you get
an additional storage case? 
A. Yes!! Just add the perk above. 
Q. Can it be
worn with earrings?
A. Yes, in most cases. 
Q. What is it
called in the menu, when connecting it to your device?
A. It is called “Solitaire”!
Q. Can I buy
after the campaign is over? 
A. If the campaign meets its goal, yes! 
Q. What happens
if the campaign is not successful? 

A. If the campaign is not
successful and you are a contributor, you will receive a full refund right
away! 





Legal Disclaimer
"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

Copyright © Tune-on . All rights reserved.

story:
The degree of suffering caused by migraines is really immense. What would you give to never have to suffer from migraines again in your life? Ten thousand dollars? Fifty thousand dollars? More?


"Hi! Just writing to let you know that the device IS working for me! Had some trouble at first with figuring it out, but have it down now. and WOW! I'm so glad I took a chance on it! Thank you sooo much! I wanted to share it with a migraine group that I'm part of on facebook but I can't find the ad anymore. Please, please don't tell me that you're not going to be making them anymore because it's a fantastic product! I have chronic migraines and am on a twice daily preventative medication, but still need to take an abortive probably 4x a week. Since I figured out how to use this device correctly, I haven't had to use the abortive at all. Thank you again"

-Shannon H, Connecticut - one of our early customers  (Thanks for the feedback Shannon!)

--

You've seen a Neti Pot or Nasal spray right? Of course. Just think Neti Pot for Carbon Dioxide. That's all this is. Why would that work? I'm sure you're familiar with the increasing scientific acceptance that our nerves can trigger massive physical changes, whether it's from Accupuncture, the sudden rush of adrenaline after hitting your elbow on a cabinet, or the multiple FDA approved migraine devices that use electrodes (surgically implanted, sadly) to trigger the vagus and/or trigeminal nerves.

You've probably even heard of the 'Daith piercing' that works on migraines for a fraction of migraine sufferers (with tens of thousands of people in that fraction, though)? The Daith piercing is also simply triggering nerves. Science now is aware that our nervous system can trigger cascading effects through our parasympathetic - or unconscious - nervous system that lead to significant physical changes. The BreatheEasy Migraine device takes advantage of triggering the same vagus and trigeminal nerves as the FDA approved implanted migraine devices - just with nothing more than what amounts to a Neti Pot for carbon dioxide. Why carbon dioxide? Well, it's concentrated carbon dioxide that causes a mild burning sensation for about 1/3 of a second - like what you get occasionally drinking a carbonated beverage. It, naturally, requires far more carbon dioxide than you have in your breath. That triggers the nerves just as well as electrodes or accupuncture, but then fades without side effects. Nothing goes in your nose except carbon dioxide - which you already have in much lower concentrations in your nose right now. After having triggered those nerves, it causes what researcher Doctor Spiering called a "Pain cascade" which is a parasympathetic (unconscious) nervous system reaction that many studies and early FDA trials - listed below - have shown is capable of eliminating or highly reducing migraines in many patients. 

 

Once upon a time it was considered impossible to create light without fire. It took mankind thousands and thousands of years to figure it out. It took Thomas Edison TEN THOUSAND tests. But when he finally figured it out, the light bulb really wasn't all that complicated. It solved mankind's age old battle with darkness via a simple and cheap device. History is full of these inventions - hard to find, simple once found. 

You might be willing to pay fifty thousand dollars to get rid of migraines for the rest of your life, but when mankind ultimately finds the solution, it might not be much more complicated than a light bulb. Would you be willing to pay just one hundred dollars to try such a solution?
 

You shouldn't have to suffer from migraines ever again. Having worked on this product for several years, we've found that migraines often impact people's lives in a way that is far worse than even we expected when we started out. 

But we couldn't be more amazed at the feedback we're getting from our first clients. Brandy told us "So far so good with it! I'm hoping that it keeps working because my insurance doesn't want to pay for the Botox anymore." That blew me away- we know the science behind the device, the early studies, we know how it has performed with our friends and family that have a few migraines a month. But imagine being in Brandy's position- having to get 9 Botox injections every year, having your expensive, obnoxious, and side-effect prone treatment dropped... and then being able to replace your treatments with a device that fits in your pocket, lasts you years, and costs under one hundred dollars. With no side effects.  

That blew me away. We knew our customers were going to be skeptical at first, having been offered so many different prospective treatments that turned out to be snake oil. On the other hand, this device is so inexpensive and backed by so much great science and so many comparable devices triggering the same nerves and the same neurological effects that have been approved by the FDA - we thought tons of people would think, "Why not try it?" But getting our first customers turned out to be so difficult, so many sufferers thinking they could sit on the sideline and wait and see what became of the device, that we were ready to give up and allow this technology to die. For the second time. If people didn't want to give it a try, well, that's their choice... We tried to bring it to them. And then we heard back from the first customers who DID give it a try. Stories like Brandy's, being saved from thousands of dollars a year and the risks of Botox by a low-cost device that can sit in her purse... Well, that changed everything. I knew we couldn't give up. It might be simple, it might be low cost, but it was letting people live free from their migraines and without side effects as well. That's priceless.

NOTE: We have the Published, Peer Reviewed Scientific Journal Studies Posted at the Bottom of this Page. Scroll Down to read them!

As you see in the video, this all started with a promising biotech startup nearly ten years ago that had invented a new way to treat migraines - using only carbon dioxide, which you are exhaling right now. They entered early trials and in their scientific testing proved that the device worked - an astounding 60-65% of the time, which DOUBLED the effectiveness rate of any drug on the market. And because the device worked by activating nerves in the sinuses - much like accu-pressure, using only harmless and natural carbon dioxide in elevated concentrations and for a split second, there were no side effects. The worst case scenario is someone tried the device and it didn't work for them, they were in the 35-40% minority. Oh well. Furthermore, the device ENHANCED the activity of any migraine medications they were using, from Tylenol to prescription drugs. A free and beneficial bonus.

But that startup decided to sell their patent rights to a drug company that made one of the primary prescription drugs on the market, and that drug company tucked the device away to protect their profits. For years I thought this was just a crappy story. Until it helped my own friend. Watch the video for the full story - but we wound up using our experience at Stanford University's Office of Technology Licensing to design around the patent... And create the even simpler and safer BreatheEasy Migraine Device!

 

Hear the Entire Crazy (and sometimes hilarious) Story Here!:

 

 

 
Please note that the full video above demonstrates the device and has the full story! It's not the same as the intro video you may have seen on another site!

 

We are CURRENTLY FULFILLING ORDERS. As soon as you order, you'll receive your device within about 2 weeks. Our first customers are already using their devices now!

The device you will get will look like the two pictured on the white background, which is the amazing updated version from what you see in the video! It is more compact, more comfortable, and has a fantastic PUSH BUTTON VALVE which makes it very easy to use. You can choose either lilac or black for color.

 

We've heard some clients saying they want to know more about how the device actually works. Easy enough!

The carbon dioxide is reacting with moisture in the sinuses to create a mild carbonic acid, which naturally occurs any time you have carbon dioxide and moisture - so it's in your airways right now. The slightly elevated carbon dioxide levels temporarily create enough weak carbonic acid to create a burning sensation that triggers your vagus nerve in your sinuses. It takes fairly pure carbon dioxide in your sinuses for about a third of a second - this is why breathing doesn't cause the effect, or breathing into a bag, or just trying to inhale CO2 out of a beverage you just opened (we tried that too). You need to effectively fill your sinuses with CO2 over a slightly extended period of time (again, about a third of a second).

Any time you've had a carbonated beverage to drink and suddenly gotten a burning sensation in your sinuses, that's effectively what we're talking about. If you can do that on demand, great! But most people sadly can't. The carbon dioxide also increases bloodflow, and through the 'capnic' system which your body uses to monitor CO2 levels, directly arouses the brainstem. That, in turn, combats the migraine!

Don't think that would work? Check this out:

http://www.aetna.com/cpb/medical/data/100_199/0191.html

http://www.nbcnews.com/health/health-news/fda-approves-vagus-nerve-stimulator-treat-cluster-headaches-n748036

The FDA has ALREADY approved vagus nerve stimulation for treatment of migraines. Except in that version you need a surgically implanted electrode. The brilliance of this device, and I suppose the reason it was buried by the drug company originally, is that it accomplishes the same exact effect without the implanted electrode. The goal is simply to activate the vagus nerve in the right spot. It doesn't matter if it's done by a mild burning sensation, or an electrode that accomplishes the same effect. 

We've also heard several people say "What if my migraines have nothing to do with my sinuses?" That's fine! Your Vagus nerve is in your sinuses and can be activated from the sinuses. However, the vagus nerve interacts with many parts of your brain and controls the level of brain function. Add that in with the effects on bloodflow and the capnic system, and the effect might start in your sinuses, but extends far beyond.

The final device you get will be even easier to use, far more refined, and custom fabricated for the task - a nice improvement over the prototype you see above. 

But the device we came up with to design around the patent that was bottled up years ago is simpler, cheaper, and even safer to use than the original device. The beauty of our device is it uses carbon dioxide from common soda beverage containers! Cheap, available everywhere, and you know it's safe to consume because you've done it your entire life. The simplicity of the product is its beauty. It makes it incredibly easy for anyone to use, which is critical when you're in the midst of a migraine. 

The great part is that unlike the many snake-oil devices out there, that biotech company did us all a favor by amassing excellent levels of funding and starting the road through FDA trials. That gave us hard science proving the effectiveness of this device and concept! Furthermore, there is an FDA approved implantable electronic device which triggers the SAME nerves as the BreatheEasy Migraine Device and has the SAME effect. Approved by the FDA and in use effectively right now! The difference? That device requires painful and life-changing surgical implantation. Whereas the BreatheEasy Migraine device couldn't be easier to use, and couldn't have less impact on anything EXCEPT migraines and other headaches. 

So this incredibly easy to use device is twice as effective as the best medications, free of side-effects, low cost, and very easy to use. The only risk in trying it is under a hundred bucks and that you might be in the minority that it doesn't work for. The worst that can happen is you spend less than a hundred bucks trying it and find it doesn't work for you - unfortunate, but it's not the end of the world. On the upside it can truly change your life, like it has for many of our clients like Brandy. Sure it's a little funny looking to use it, but less than a hundred dollars and looking silly in private in the bathroom are a small price to pay for getting rid of migraines!

 

If you're a blogger or work for a magazine or other media outlet, please e-mail me at dak.steiert@alumni.stanford.edu - we have the ability to send media prototypes. If you suffer from migraines and tell us which blog or media organization you work for, we'd be happy to send you out a prototype for free right away so that you can try it out. We only ask that if it works for you, you write about it as soon as possible so that this project can succeed and we can go into production and help thousands more!

 

We sincerely hope this helps as many people as possible! And thank you to our clients who have let us know their stories about how much the device is already helping them! We're doing this for you.

 

But don't take our word for it! Here's the research (Warning! Science Content!):

Scientific journal research-

"A device that sends pressurized carbon dioxide up one nostril and out the other -- without being inhaled -- appears to rapidly abort migraine pain, researchers reported."
"We think these studies suggest that intranasal carbon dioxide provides a well-tolerated and safe alternative for the abortive treatment of migraine headache"
ANA: CO2 Nasal Spray Relieves Migraine Pain
https://www.medpagetoday.com/neurology/migraine...

"Nasal delivery of small amounts of CO2 for a short period of time has, in clinical trials, shown effects on migraine and on the symptoms of allergic rhinitis."
"Abortive treatment of migraine headache with non-inhaled, intranasal carbon dioxide: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel-group study" Conference Paper, June 2005
https://www.researchgate.net/publication/296304...

"Intranasal CO(2) application produced a robust dose-dependent antihyperalgesic effect in rats that lasted at least one hour. Blockade of nasal carbonic anhydrase with a dorzolamide solution (Trusopt ophthalmic solution) showed only a non-significant decrease of the antihyperalgesic effect of intranasal CO(2) application."
"Trigeminal antihyperalgesic effect of intranasal carbon dioxide."
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/20561904

 

"While the gas is flowing, carbon dioxide readily permeates the nasal mucous membranes creating carbonic acid and decreasing the pH of the nociceptive nerve fibers, Dr. Spierings said. The acidosis created is potent enough to prevent stimulation of neurons and activation of the pain cascade. A bystander effect that follows prevents activation throughout the trigeminal nerve system." Quoted from Dr. Spiering related to the above studies

--------
The Clinical Trial, Eventually Stopped when Capnia Inc sold the Patent Rights

"The Effect of Nasal Carbon Dioxide in the Treatment of Moderate to Severe Migraine"
https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT01253915
 

(If you can obtain the results report from these studies for us, we would love to have them! We would love to have the full report on 450 patients in a controlled double blind study)

-----

The patent that led to the whole drug-company debacle is US Patent Number 8,096,968:

"The present invention relates to drug delivery. More particularly, the present invention relates to methods and apparatus for delivering agents that cause vasoconstriction to mucosal and other tissue surfaces in the presence of capnic gases [CO2 is the most common 'capnic' gas], particularly for the treatment of migraine headaches."

--------

Further Scientific Journal Research Articles:

"To maintain pH homeostasis, there are sensors (central chemoreceptors) within the brainstem that monitor carbon dioxide levels and control lung ventilation at the requisite level to keep blood PCO2 (partial pressure of carbon dioxide) within the normal physiological range. [...] Most serotonergic neurons are located within the midline RAPHÉ NUCLEI3–5, and can be divided into a caudal group in the medulla (including the raphé pallidus, raphé magnus and raphé obscurus in the midline and the parapyramidal region on the VLMS), and a rostral group in the pons and midbrain (including the pontine raphé, dorsal raphé and median raphé). These two groups have different embryological origins and projections. Those in the medulla project throughout the medulla and spinal cord, where they influence breathing, cardiovascular control, autonomic output, motor control and pain processing3,8–10. Those in the midbrain raphé project throughout the forebrain, and are associated with arousal11, anxiety and aggression12, and control of cerebral blood flow13–15. This review will focus on evidence that serotonergic neurons on the VLMS, and in the medullary raphé, are sensors of arterial blood carbon dioxide." Richerson, George B, Nature Reviews Journal - Neuroscience, Jun 2004
 

"EFFECTS OF CARBON DIOXIDE-OXYGEN MIXTURE GIVEN DURING PREHEADACHE (VASOCONSTRICTOR) STAGE. [...]  A physician who had loss of segments of his visual fields prior to headache was able transiently to restore his vision to normal" Journal of NeuroPsychology, Vol 63

"Therefore, this report was attempted to evaluate the effect of hypercapnia on somatosensory evoked potential (SEP), using the similar ischemic model as previously. The results showed that mild hypercapnia of 43 to 55 mm Hg range was beneficial not only for enhancing decreased perfusion flow but also for restoring suppressed SEP. This report seems to be the first publication which verifies a presence of correlation between local cortical blood flow (LCBF) and SEP under mild hypercapnia in mildly to moderately ischemic brain tissues." Y Nakagawa et al, AHA Journals Vol 15 Issue 2

"Cerebral blood flow is highly sensitive to carbon dioxide (CO2) level changes. The existence of a migraine threshold to the CO2 air concentration is hypothesized." M.N.Schwarzberg, Medical Hypothesis, Vol 41

----

We are Currently Producing and Shipping the BreatheEasy Migraine Device right now!

 

Here We Are Shipping Out Orders! Gotta love that!

 

 

Thank you for your time, and let us know if the device works as well for you as it has for those that have tried it so far!

 

Legal disclaimer: The early FDA trials on nasal inhaled CO2 for migraines and the published scientific journal research show that this device may eliminate or greatly reduce migraines in 60-65% of patients, and that is backed up by our customer reports, but everyone is biologically different so nothing will work on all migraine sufferers. FDA trials cost $10 million - $100 million to complete generally, which is 10 to 100 times more than this device would make even if 1 out of 100 people who suffer migraines purchased one - so while we would love to pursue that route, no simple and effective one-time purchase migraine device will ever be able to gain that stamp of approval due to the sheer cost. This is a large reason all FDA approved devices are either expensive ($400 plus) or require ongoing use (Botox, drugs). This device only uses carbon dioxide from soda beverages, however, which is - of course - already approved for human consumption. NOT A MEDICAL DEVICE - Simply nozzle and valve that direct and meter gas from soda, like a snorkel or sippy cup top, CO2 from not-included, FDA approved soda has affect

The worst case scenario is someone tried the device and it didn't work for them, they were in the 35-40% minority. Oh well. Furthermore, the device ENHANCED the activity of any migraine medications they were using, from Tylenol to prescription drugs. A free and beneficial bonus.But that startup decided to sell their patent rights to a drug company that made one of the primary prescription drugs on the market, and that drug company tucked the device away to protect their profits. For years I thought this was just a crappy story. Until it helped my own friend. Watch the video for the full story - but we wound up using our experience at Stanford University's Office of Technology Licensing to design around the patent... And create the even simpler and safer BreatheEasy Migraine Device! Hear the Entire Crazy (and sometimes hilarious) Story Here!:


 

 
 Please note that the full video above demonstrates the device and has the full story! It's not the same as the intro video you may have seen on another site! We are CURRENTLY FULFILLING ORDERS. As soon as you order, you'll receive your device within about 2 weeks. Our first customers are already using their devices now!The device you will get will look like the two pictured on the white background, which is the amazing updated version from what you see in the video! It is more compact, more comfortable, and has a fantastic PUSH BUTTON VALVE which makes it very easy to use. You can choose either lilac or black for color. We've heard some clients saying they want to know more about how the device actually works. Easy enough!The carbon dioxide is reacting with moisture in the sinuses to create a mild carbonic acid, which naturally occurs any time you have carbon dioxide and moisture - so it's in your airways right now. The slightly elevated carbon dioxide levels temporarily create enough weak carbonic acid to create a burning sensation that triggers your vagus nerve in your sinuses. It takes fairly pure carbon dioxide in your sinuses for about a third of a second - this is why breathing doesn't cause the effect, or breathing into a bag, or just trying to inhale CO2 out of a beverage you just opened (we tried that too). You need to effectively fill your sinuses with CO2 over a slightly extended period of time (again, about a third of a second).Any time you've had a carbonated beverage to drink and suddenly gotten a burning sensation in your sinuses, that's effectively what we're talking about. If you can do that on demand, great! But most people sadly can't. The carbon dioxide also increases bloodflow, and through the 'capnic' system which your body uses to monitor CO2 levels, directly arouses the brainstem. That, in turn, combats the migraine!Don't think that would work? Check this out:http://www.aetna.com/cpb/medical/data/100_199/0191.htmlhttp://www.nbcnews.com/health/health-news/fda-approves-vagus-nerve-stimulator-treat-cluster-headaches-n748036The FDA has ALREADY approved vagus nerve stimulation for treatment of migraines. Except in that version you need a surgically implanted electrode. The brilliance of this device, and I suppose the reason it was buried by the drug company originally, is that it accomplishes the same exact effect without the implanted electrode. The goal is simply to activate the vagus nerve in the right spot. It doesn't matter if it's done by a mild burning sensation, or an electrode that accomplishes the same effect. We've also heard several people say "What if my migraines have nothing to do with my sinuses?" That's fine! Your Vagus nerve is in your sinuses and can be activated from the sinuses. However, the vagus nerve interacts with many parts of your brain and controls the level of brain function. Add that in with the effects on bloodflow and the capnic system, and the effect might start in your sinuses, but extends far beyond.The final device you get will be even easier to use, far more refined, and custom fabricated for the task - a nice improvement over the prototype you see above. But the device we came up with to design around the patent that was bottled up years ago is simpler, cheaper, and even safer to use than the original device. The beauty of our device is it uses carbon dioxide from common soda beverage containers! Cheap, available everywhere, and you know it's safe to consume because you've done it your entire life. The simplicity of the product is its beauty. It makes it incredibly easy for anyone to use, which is critical when you're in the midst of a migraine. The great part is that unlike the many snake-oil devices out there, that biotech company did us all a favor by amassing excellent levels of funding and starting the road through FDA trials. That gave us hard science proving the effectiveness of this device and concept! Furthermore, there is an FDA approved implantable electronic device which triggers the SAME nerves as the BreatheEasy Migraine Device and has the SAME effect. Approved by the FDA and in use effectively right now! The difference? That device requires painful and life-changing surgical implantation. Whereas the BreatheEasy Migraine device couldn't be easier to use, and couldn't have less impact on anything EXCEPT migraines and other headaches. So this incredibly easy to use device is twice as effective as the best medications, free of side-effects, low cost, and very easy to use. The only risk in trying it is under a hundred bucks and that you might be in the minority that it doesn't work for. The worst that can happen is you spend less than a hundred bucks trying it and find it doesn't work for you - unfortunate, but it's not the end of the world. On the upside it can truly change your life, like it has for many of our clients like Brandy. Sure it's a little funny looking to use it, but less than a hundred dollars and looking silly in private in the bathroom are a small price to pay for getting rid of migraines! If you're a blogger or work for a magazine or other media outlet, please e-mail me at dak.steiert@alumni.stanford.edu - we have the ability to send media prototypes. If you suffer from migraines and tell us which blog or media organization you work for, we'd be happy to send you out a prototype for free right away so that you can try it out. We only ask that if it works for you, you write about it as soon as possible so that this project can succeed and we can go into production and help thousands more! We sincerely hope this helps as many people as possible! And thank you to our clients who have let us know their stories about how much the device is already helping them! We're doing this for you. But don't take our word for it! Here's the research (Warning! Science Content!):Scientific journal research-"A device that sends pressurized carbon dioxide up one nostril and out the other -- without being inhaled -- appears to rapidly abort migraine pain, researchers reported.""We think these studies suggest that intranasal carbon dioxide provides a well-tolerated and safe alternative for the abortive treatment of migraine headache"ANA: CO2 Nasal Spray Relieves Migraine Painhttps://www.medpagetoday.com/neurology/migraine..."Nasal delivery of small amounts of CO2 for a short period of time has, in clinical trials, shown effects on migraine and on the symptoms of allergic rhinitis.""Abortive treatment of migraine headache with non-inhaled, intranasal carbon dioxide: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel-group study" Conference Paper, June 2005https://www.researchgate.net/publication/296304..."Intranasal CO(2) application produced a robust dose-dependent antihyperalgesic effect in rats that lasted at least one hour. Blockade of nasal carbonic anhydrase with a dorzolamide solution (Trusopt ophthalmic solution) showed only a non-significant decrease of the antihyperalgesic effect of intranasal CO(2) application.""Trigeminal antihyperalgesic effect of intranasal carbon dioxide."https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/20561904 "While the gas is flowing, carbon dioxide readily permeates the nasal mucous membranes creating carbonic acid and decreasing the pH of the nociceptive nerve fibers, Dr. Spierings said. The acidosis created is potent enough to prevent stimulation of neurons and activation of the pain cascade. A bystander effect that follows prevents activation throughout the trigeminal nerve system." Quoted from Dr. Spiering related to the above studies--------The Clinical Trial, Eventually Stopped when Capnia Inc sold the Patent Rights"The Effect of Nasal Carbon Dioxide in the Treatment of Moderate to Severe Migraine"https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT01253915 (If you can obtain the results report from these studies for us, we would love to have them! We would love to have the full report on 450 patients in a controlled double blind study)-----The patent that led to the whole drug-company debacle is US Patent Number 8,096,968:"The present invention relates to drug delivery. More particularly, the present invention relates to methods and apparatus for delivering agents that cause vasoconstriction to mucosal and other tissue surfaces in the presence of capnic gases [CO2 is the most common 'capnic' gas], particularly for the treatment of migraine headaches."--------Further Scientific Journal Research Articles:"To maintain pH homeostasis, there are sensors (central chemoreceptors) within the brainstem that monitor carbon dioxide levels and control lung ventilation at the requisite level to keep blood PCO2 (partial pressure of carbon dioxide) within the normal physiological range. [...] Most serotonergic neurons are located within the midline RAPHÉ NUCLEI3–5, and can be divided into a caudal group in the medulla (including the raphé pallidus, raphé magnus and raphé obscurus in the midline and the parapyramidal region on the VLMS), and a rostral group in the pons and midbrain (including the pontine raphé, dorsal raphé and median raphé). These two groups have different embryological origins and projections. Those in the medulla project throughout the medulla and spinal cord, where they influence breathing, cardiovascular control, autonomic output, motor control and pain processing3,8–10. Those in the midbrain raphé project throughout the forebrain, and are associated with arousal11, anxiety and aggression12, and control of cerebral blood flow13–15. This review will focus on evidence that serotonergic neurons on the VLMS, and in the medullary raphé, are sensors of arterial blood carbon dioxide." Richerson, George B, Nature Reviews Journal - Neuroscience, Jun 2004 "EFFECTS OF CARBON DIOXIDE-OXYGEN MIXTURE GIVEN DURING PREHEADACHE (VASOCONSTRICTOR) STAGE. [...]  A physician who had loss of segments of his visual fields prior to headache was able transiently to restore his vision to normal" Journal of NeuroPsychology, Vol 63"Therefore, this report was attempted to evaluate the effect of hypercapnia on somatosensory evoked potential (SEP), using the similar ischemic model as previously. The results showed that mild hypercapnia of 43 to 55 mm Hg range was beneficial not only for enhancing decreased perfusion flow but also for restoring suppressed SEP. This report seems to be the first publication which verifies a presence of correlation between local cortical blood flow (LCBF) and SEP under mild hypercapnia in mildly to moderately ischemic brain tissues." Y Nakagawa et al, AHA Journals Vol 15 Issue 2"Cerebral blood flow is highly sensitive to carbon dioxide (CO2) level changes. The existence of a migraine threshold to the CO2 air concentration is hypothesized." M.N.Schwarzberg, Medical Hypothesis, Vol 41----We are Currently Producing and Shipping the BreatheEasy Migraine Device right now! Here We Are Shipping Out Orders! Gotta love that!

 
 Thank you for your time, and let us know if the device works as well for you as it has for those that have tried it so far! Legal disclaimer: The early FDA trials on nasal inhaled CO2 for migraines and the published scientific journal research show that this device may eliminate or greatly reduce migraines in 60-65% of patients, and that is backed up by our customer reports, but everyone is biologically different so nothing will work on all migraine sufferers. FDA trials cost $10 million - $100 million to complete generally, which is 10 to 100 times more than this device would make even if 1 out of 100 people who suffer migraines purchased one - so while we would love to pursue that route, no simple and effective one-time purchase migraine device will ever be able to gain that stamp of approval due to the sheer cost. This is a large reason all FDA approved devices are either expensive ($400 plus) or require ongoing use (Botox, drugs). This device only uses carbon dioxide from soda beverages, however, which is - of course - already approved for human consumption. NOT A MEDICAL DEVICE - Simply nozzle and valve that direct and meter gas from soda, like a snorkel or sippy cup top, CO2 from not-included, FDA approved soda has affect

story:
It is well known that most of us take our phones and tablets everywhere, and we mean everywhere! Yet, it is strange to find out that our devices are filthy dirty, studies have found that they are 18x dirtier than a toilet seat and yet what do we do? We put these devices up to our faces and swipe the screens with our fingers, all while we are having lunch! That’s just how it is. We discovered a long term solution for you.

 

THE SELF-SANITISING™ SHIELD

When we asked around why people didn't sanitise their phone despite medical professional repeatedly suggest that phone is the No. 1 Disease transmission medium. The most common feedback was that "I have no time" "Boring" "I'm not sure"

So, We have carefully analysed and zoomed in to the materials used by these gadgets and created a brand new solution that we call Self-Sanitising™ Technology. Inspired by "Human Antibody" -- a system that protect against diseases automatically and regenerate by itself. THYMOS® releases negatively charged bacteriostatic electrons to form an invisible shield to give your phone a "Man-Made-Antibody" resulting a phone that protects against pathogens automatically whenever you touch.

 

NO MORE REPEATED SCRUBS, ONCE IS ENOUGH.

Medical Revolution

This is our medical signature feature and we’ve filed a patent while we incorporated it into GadgetCare™. Without the use of Alcohols or Toxic-chemicals, instead THYMOS® uses Activated Mineral to generate bacteriostatic electron in sterilising the pathogens. Best? The shield continuously regenerates itself and last up to 365 days. This is a breakthroughs innovation in redefining hygiene and we believed the future is "automatically".

 

NO MORE OILY SCREEN & SMELLY ODOUR

How does it work? THYMOS® makes your screen super-hydrophilic to ensure liquid such as sweat, dusts and grease impossible to stand on. In an instant application, you can control your phone even with sweaty/greasy hands without stubborn odours - at the same time, enhancing your touchscreen sensitivity so you will never miss a corner again.

 

MEDICAL STANDARD

While other sanitisers reduce bacteria temporarily, we turn the world's deadliest viruses into ash!

With GadgetCare, you will see oxidised-protein stains on the surface of your phone everyday when you woke up. These oxidised-protein stains are collapsed viruses, bacteria & grease.

WE KEEP THE DOCTORS AWAY!

 

 

 

 

GO FURTHER WITH GADGETCARE™

Your mobile phone is not all that you touch daily.THYMOS is compatible to protect other gadgets such as laptops, cameras, iPads, and any touchscreen devices – you name it!

 

 

HERE IS WHY YOU NEED ONE

 

 

INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE DEALS

We successfully developed THYMOS® and implemented the technology through sanitising healthcare facilities such as hospitals, clinics, laboratories, schools & retail outlets. There’s no better time than now! you’ll get exclusive discounts and prices that we’ll never offer again. 

 

Need help? We're here for you.

If you have questions at any time, during the campaign or after it’s closed, you can always reach us at info@thymos.uk

story:
I am a father, a husband, and I have a disease called Pulmonary Hypertension, there is no cure. It makes it hard to breathe, hard to to do almost anything. When I was employed, and on leave from work when this was just discovered my employer's insurance dropped me, and the medical bills started to rise. We tried to get new insurance and had no luck because they consider it a preexisting condition. We have the opportunity now to get insurance but its costly.

Right now I take 9 different pills and 3 different injections daily. I have many more tests to go through so the doctors can set the correct medication for me, so I am at least comfortable and can live a little longer, maybe breathe a little easier and be there a little longer for my wife and children. I have never asked for help and I hope there are folks out there who can help or get the word out to maybe help me through this rough time.

From Mayo Clinic online:

http://www.mayoclinic.com/health/pulmonary-hype...

Pulmonary hypertension begins when tiny arteries in your lungs, called pulmonary arteries, and capillaries become narrowed, blocked or destroyed. This makes it harder for blood to flow through your lungs, and raises pressure within your lungs' arteries. As the pressure builds, your heart's lower right chamber (right ventricle) must work harder to pump blood through your lungs, eventually causing your heart muscle to weaken and eventually fail.

Pulmonary hypertension is a serious illness that becomes progressively worse and is sometimes fatal. Although pulmonary hypertension isn't curable, treatments are available that can help lessen symptoms and improve your quality of life.

Pulmonary hypertension symptoms include:

  • Shortness of breath (dyspnea), initially while exercising and eventually while at rest
  • Fatigue
  • Dizziness or fainting spells (syncope)
  • Chest pressure or pain
  • Swelling (edema) in your ankles, legs and eventually in your abdomen (ascites)
  • Bluish color to your lips and skin (cyanosis)
  • Racing pulse or heart palpitations

story:
Our Story

     Marlee Ross and Myfanwy Bakker, a mother-daughter team, will be embarking in early September 2011 on a medical pilgrimage to the remote northern region of Nepal, the Tibetan Buddhist Kingdom of Mustang. 

     Myfanwy as a Registered Nurse, and Marlee as a Buddhist Chaplain, will be joining Roshi Joan Halifax, Abbott of Upaya Zen Centre in New Mexico, and her team of clinicians and support workers, to serve the nomadic people of Mustang in a series of Nomads Medical Clinics that have been established over 30 years of pilgrimage and practice.

     The above video demonstrates the success of the medical clinics previously established under the leadership of Roshi Joan Halifax. The Mustang region of Nepal, where we will be serving is virtually identical in its remote geography, and pressing medical and educational needs as the region of Kham.


The Impact

     Mustang is a Buddhist kingdom in the remotest area of the Nepalese Himalayas. Only a handful of Westerners had visited there before it was opened in 1992. Travellers brought back reports of a culturally highly developed, thriving medieval society and a geography almost beyond description, with its towering columns of earth and stone, and tightly woven villages in the fertile veins of a sculptured landscape. 

     Today, the population lives nomadically or in intimate adobe villages, situated to grow crops of barley, buckwheat and potatoes. Heards of yaks, goats and sheep move seasonally across the remote high trails. Although physically striking, this remote area of the Himalayas now suffers from extreme poverty. There is virtually no consistent medical care or education available, as Nepal has such a fragile infrastructure. On average there is one doctor for every 20 000 Nepalese and this ratio increases drastically in remote areas like Mustang. 

     The route we follow is off the main trail, deep in the mountains and canyons of old Mustang. We will walk, or ride horses, in this extraordinary landscape, offering medical care, and basic survival and educational supplies to the nomads and villagers as we move along.


What We Need 

     The money raised through this campaign will go directly to the purchase of medical, survival and educational supplies for the people of Mustang, Nepal. Marlee and Myfanwy will personally purchase the items in Canada, which have been specifically requested by Roshi Joan Halifax and her medical team lead Kat, an RN who has served in multiple Nomads Medical Clinics. We will personally transport these humanitarian supplies to Nepal, and participate directly in their distribution and use in the medical clinics. We will be assisted by our trusty Nepalese pack horses as we move through the mountains and villages of Mustang.

How You Can Help


DONATE!!!!  
All donations and generosity accepted thankfully. NO DONATION IS TOO SMALL! We unfortunately are NOT able to provide tax receipts for this mission as it is a small American buddhist centre. It is regardless a legitimate mission, and hope this does not deter your generous donations!!!! THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!


VANCOUVER FRIENDS 

In addition to, or as an alternative to financial donation, we would be grateful to receive new, or gently used items as below. If you are not wearing that lovely fleece, now is the time to gift it!!! 


MEDICAL FRIENDS

For direct donation of medications and medical supplies, and more information about this, please contact Myfanwy personally.


Requested List

  • Toothbrushes (no toothpaste)
  • Pens and pencils
  • Other school supplies (erasers, pencil cases)
  • Small notebooks or pads of paper
  • Baseball hats (child and adult size)
  • Warm hats or toques
  • Scarves
  • Sunglasses (child and adult size)
  • Reading glasses (all strengths)
  • Gently used fleece clothing (jackets, vests, infant sleepers, all sizes)
  • Warm socks (child and adult sizes)
  • Chapstick
  • Children's chewable vitamins (sealed)
  • Prenatal vitamins (sealed)
  • Extra-strength Ibuprofen (sealed)
  • Pepcid AC or other antacids (sealed, generic is fine!)
  • Tums
  • Soothing-type eyedrops
  • Used respiratory puffers 
  • Bandaids or sealed gauze
  • Anything you would find in a first aid kit!!!!

story:
On August 8, 2013 our brother’s life was forever changed.  Omar Luis Capo was recently diagnosed with a rare form of head and neck cancer called Sclerosing Rhabdomysarcoma.  The cancer is a rare tumor with only several hundred new cases per year throughout the United States and its cause is unknown.  Most cases are found in children so the discovery of this disease, being found in an adult well beyond the adolescent years and into their 30’s is very rare. The revelation has even shocked highly trained physicians who closely follow and research this rare disease.  As you can imagine, our family was devastated when the news was released to us, however at this point, our only option is to prepare for this great battle.

Omar is a single father with an amazing and courageous 12 year old son, Israel.  Omar is an entrepreneur.  He has been a successful barber since the age of 15.  Like many who venture out on their own know the responsibility and time it takes to start and run a successful business. Omar has followed his dreams relentlessly. Due to an aggressive approach on treating this disease, Omar has been forced to close his business and will no longer be able to work until he is completely cancer free.  Without medical coverage and limited resources to cover general appointments, medications, and treatment costs to sustain his health and financial well-being, Omar is at a tremendous financial loss because of his inability to work.  We are reaching out to families across the region, state, and country, asking for your support.  The location of the cancer is in a delicate area, between his left jawbone to the bottom left side of his skull and brain stem.  The doctors are now planning to do several rounds of chemotherapy, another surgery to remove another tumor, radiation and some reconstructive surgery as the cancer has effected part of his jaw bone structure.  We sincerely appreciate all the heart-felt love, prayers, positive thoughts, outpouring of support and any contribution you so chose to give.  As a family,  WE WILL NOT REST until Omar's health has been completely restored!  We will continue with helping others who are in the fight of their lives battling different forms of cancer as well.

Ultimately our battles are won and lost in our minds and hearts, so lets be sure to keep our thoughts positive and full of life and our hearts full of love!!!
story_txt:
On August 8, 2013 our brother’s life was forever changed.  Omar Luis 
Capo was recently diagnosed with a rare form of head and neck cancer 
called Sclerosing Rhabdomysarcoma.  The cancer is a rare tumor with only
 several hundred new cases per year throughout the United States and its
 cause is unknown.  Most cases are found in children so the discovery of
 this disease, being found in an adult well beyond the adolescent years 
and into their 30’s is very rare. The revelation has even shocked highly
 trained physicians who closely follow and research this rare disease.  
As you can imagine, our family was devastated when the news was released
 to us, however at this point, our only option is to prepare for this 
great battle.Omar is a single father with an amazing and 
courageous 12 year old son, Israel.  Omar is an entrepreneur.  He has 
been a successful barber since the age of 15.  Like many who venture out
 on their own know the responsibility and time it takes to start and run
 a successful business. Omar has followed his dreams relentlessly. Due 
to an aggressive approach on treating this disease, Omar has been forced
 to close his business and will no longer be able to work until he is 
completely cancer free.  Without medical coverage and limited resources 
to cover general appointments, medications, and treatment costs to 
sustain his health and financial well-being, Omar is at a tremendous 
financial loss because of his inability to work.  We are reaching out to
 families across the region, state, and country, asking for your 
support.  The location of the cancer is in a delicate area, between his 
left jawbone to the bottom left side of his skull and brain stem.  The 
doctors are now planning to do several rounds of chemotherapy, another 
surgery to remove another tumor, radiation and some reconstructive 
surgery as the cancer has effected part of his jaw bone structure.  We 
sincerely appreciate all the heart-felt love, prayers, positive 
thoughts, outpouring of support and any contribution you so chose to 
give.  As a family,  WE WILL NOT REST until Omar's health has been 
completely restored!  We will continue with helping others who are in 
the fight of their lives battling different forms of cancer as well. Ultimately
 our battles are won and lost in our minds and hearts, so lets be sure 
to keep our thoughts positive and full of life and our hearts full of 
love!!!

story:
VI VIL UDVIKLE EN PROBIOTISK KUR MOD AKNE

Selv den mindste donation gør en forskel


DEVELOPING A PROBIOTIC CURE AGAINST ACNE

Your donation makes the difference 


Why a probiotic treatment and why now? 

  • Treatment against acne has not changed for several decades, They consist of antibiotics and retinoids that are applied for several months; these can have several side effects.
  • Since a few years, we realize how important the bacterial microbiota is for our health. We want to exploit these new reseach findings.
  • A probiotic acne therapy  consists of "good" bacteria that are part of the healthy skin microbiota. They are topically applied to the skin and should out-compete the "bad" bacterial population as seen on acne-affected skin. This treatment will have presumably minimal to no risks of side effects. 
  • Our international team of scientists and dermatologists at Aarhus University, Rockefeller University and University of Cambridge will test the feasibility of this probiotic treatment option. PLEASE HELP US NOW! 
  • More information about the project and about us: www.acnesci.com



Why this crowdfunding project?

By funding our research you will help us in our efforts to cure acne, and potentially help millions who daily suffer from the stigmatization of this skin disease, leaving many patients in isolation resulting in increased rates of joblessness, depression and even suicide.

We are an international science team based at Aarhus University, Denmark. Our previous research revealed the association of certain types of bacteria with normal skin and others that are associated with acne vulgaris.                                

Help us raise funds and support us in our efforts to exploit these findings in making a cream containing health-associated bacteria, aimed to out-compete the subgroups of acne-associated bacteria and their products which trigger inflammation of the skin seen in acne. This topically applied cream would then work similarly to other probiotic products, e.g. yogurts to influence the gut microbiota. 



The budget for the study:



Replacement strategy 40,000 USD

  • microbiota sequencing(before/after treatment: n=10): 32,000 USD
  • bacterial cultivation, skin sample preparation/extraction: 8,000 USD

Inhibition strategy 60,000 USD

  • cloning/expression of P. acnes factor: 10,000 USD
  • purification/biochemical characterization: 10,000 USD
  • structural analysis of target protein: 10,000 USD
  • screening of selected inhibitory substances: 30,000 USD


The team and detailed explanation of the proposed research:


Click here if you want a more detailed explanation


Perks, Click on your favorite on the rigth side of the screen

KEY SPONSORS

Get your logo or name on our indiegogo wall and all of our media platforms, as shown below - in our fight against acne, we will reach out to thousands of people, be a big part of this fight and help us make acne history.




Want to know which types of P. acnes colonize your skin? 

With "Your body is a temple". You will receive a special skin swap kit, developed by our group. You will collect your own skin sample, send it back to us and we will then sequence-analyze it in our lab. You will receive a personal chart of your own skin microbiota.


MAKE A STAR DONATION

Get your name on our facebook wall, and appear on the homepage news feed with your name and a special designed star medal



P.ACNES SOUVENIR

Help us and get a P. acnes teddy bear souvenir, to remind you of the action you did for the fight against acne!

More pictures on: The P. acnes souvenir


Take part in the acne revolution!

  • Share this campaign with Friends on Facebook
  • Like us on facebook and share your acne story with the world
  • Embed this page on your website or blog
  • Email your friends and family to support and share this page

Contact: Kenneth.thomsen@mikrobiologi.au.dk

story:
Update-

We want to THANK each and every person who has donated so far! The support my Mom has received is amazing and it is very much helping her keep strong. We have had a lot of requests to keep this Campaign going, and although IndieGoGo doesnt let you "Extend" Campaigns, they very much encourage reposting Campaigns, so we decided to go ahead and repost this Campaign to allow people to continue donating if they choose to, but most importantly my Mom very much enjoys using the Campaign to post her Updates and Status/Reports through out her process. It is also a great place for people to also post comments/support just to show her how much everyone truely does care and support and love her! We want everyone to know we will be getting the "Perks" from the first Campaign out to everyone who has supplied their address, please be patient as of course our health makes everything a bit slower, but we will get our offical THANKS out very soon! I hope everyone know how much all the support means to not only my Mom but to us as a Family! Please keep watching this Campaign and reading the Updates my Mom places in the "Update" tab at the top of this page. The URL www.4Lynnette.com will point to the new Campaign as soon as it updates as well, but if you would like to see the old Campaign, or read previous updates you can still do that by going to http://igg.me/p/304397/x/1796013

I will also repost the original Campaign story below so anyone new to the Campaign can have a chance to read a wonderful story about a wonderful Woman! LOVE YOU MOM!

 

Original Story-

The next few minutes are for anyone who cares enough to take the next few minutes of their life to read about a women who deserves every minute you give her! My name is Richard, son of Lynnette and Johnny. I really have no idea where to begin, my parents are quite literally my best friends and I would not change it for a thing. In this Campaign I went further then just "asking for donations", I want this Campaign to tell my Moms story!

 

Let start in 1983 when my Mom Lynnette just found out she was pregnant. This is a time when most women are so very much happy and excited, and I am sure my Mom had felt the same way, but behind all that excitement still laid a feeling that NO women wants to feel. To explain what I mean, I need to take you back even further, when my Mom was 9 years old she was diagnosed with Kidney Disease. She spent her whole childhood in & out of hospitals, surgery's and transplants. By the age of 13 she has went through more then most people need to go through in a life time 10 times over, and over the years she has had TWO transplants, the years following I am sure she was excited that the 2nd transplant was doing well, but the disease also left her with a lifetime of other problems like very low immune system, life long medications, other complications including NOT having children. So when my Mom found out she was pregnant with me....a time when a woman is suppose to be on top of the world, the doctors are telling her she CANNOT have me, but against ALL the doctors NO's my Mom stood tall and told them all that she did not care the risks to herself, if the baby would be healthy is all she cared about, so putting ALL her problems and health aside for me, she went on with the pregnancy. Sure there were some complications, and some problems here and there but she said strong through the whole process and never once put herself before me, she quite literally was 100% willing to give her own life, to give life to her baby son....ME, and I will never ever forget that.

 

Through the years our Family has had many many downs, but I would trade nothing for all the great UP's that we had as well! Though my Mom had a hard childhood that led to a rough adulthood, she always gave her heart to the people around her. When I was 5 years old my Father was in a very bad accident that left him with a broken back and broken neck that led to MANY MANY surgeries, and even though my Mom had so many things to worry about with herself she still stood by his side through every single one of those surgeries giving her support, help and love to him and I, taking care of ANYTHING that needed to be done, paying bills, working 2 jobs to pay bills, driving to hospitals, running the house! She did ANYTHING the family needed, because she cared! My Father and I can not thank her enough, nor would a thanks be close to enough. My Father still of course has many problems and is still to this day having surgeries to help with the problems, and even now 20 years later my Mom STILL does everything she can for him and I.

 

In 2005 another tragedy struck when I was in a very severe high speed motorcycle accident that left me hospitalized for a month, and after discharged I needed home care for the next year. The hospital recommended a temp home, or a full time nurse to help, but my Mom INSISTED that she help her baby boy, she spent the next year of her life changing bandages and taking care of me in ANYWAY that she could, because that is just the type of wonderful person she is. How do you thank someone for something like that? And again same as my Father, to this day...even 8 years later I still have chronic pain and problems, and again still to this day my Mom gives her heart to make sure she does everything she can to make my life just that much better. And I truly cannot ever thank her enough for everything she has done and continues TO do for me. A few years after my accident, my Mom was in a accident as well that ended up totaling her pick-up truck and left her with chronic back pain and has also had a knee replacement, but even with those problems piled on to everything else....she STILL stands strong and gives 100% to the Family.

 

Then in 2006 my Grandma became ill, and my Mom being the wonderful person she was, stopped working and basically moved in with my Grandma (Her Mother). She lived with my Grandmother for about 80% of the time for the next 2 years, and helped my Grandmother is any and every way she could, driving her, cleaning her, cleaning her house, laundry, pay bills and everything else needed to make my Grandmas life just that much easier for her, ALL on top of still taking care of my Father and I all at the same time, I truly do not know how she did it, I think she is secretly superwoman, and if shes not....then she is 100% still Superwoman in my eyes that is for sure. Unfortunately my Grandmother passed away, and that was very hard on my Mom, and still is, but again my Mom stands strong giving 100% to us, and again....how on earth does someone show how much that means to them? It means the world to me, and I hope she realizes that.

 

You normally would think that....come on, this Family has been through enough, they lived happily ever after.....right? Unfortunately, this is not the way the cards fell. December 19th, 2012, my Mom was diagnosed with Stomach Cancer, its is very hard to come to terms with this because although NO person deserves that horrible disease, but I think she truly deserves to NOT have been burdened with this, she has been through to much to deal her such cards. She will be spending time going through surgeries and tests, chemo, etc. & she is tough enough that I know she will beat it, but I also wanted to come here to let the world know the wonderful person she is, and hope she will be in everyone's prayers and thoughts. Unfortunately my Mom has NO insurance, and I need to reach out more then ever for a helping hand from ANYONE who has a hand to give. Family, Friends, and Strangers alike, I think my Mom Lynnette DESERVES more then anyone to NOT have to have this burden on her shoulders and I would like for this Campaign to get as Viral as possible to not only tell her story and show my everlasting love. But I also truly believe that my Mom 100% DESERVES a break, I would not only like this campaign to generate enough money to help pay doctors, hospitals, prescriptions and treatments, BUT I also would love for it to generate enough money for her to just get away for awhile.......relax.....really truly take a break, she has been working NON STOP since 9 years old....Don t you think she FINALLY deserves a vacation?

 

Please help in anyway you can! If all you can do is pass this campaign on to someone else, then PLEASE do. If you can afford to donate then by all means, PLEASE do. Lynnette really deserves SO much more, but if telling her story and reaching a helping hand makes a big enough difference to lift just SOME of that burden, then at least I feel like I have just STARTED the process of repaying my Mom for all the Love, Blood, Sweat, Tears and more Love that my Mom has given me my entire life! I want her Positive, Standing Strong and Determined, the last thing I want on her mind is how bills are going to be paid, she has other things to focus on right now! Thank you for taking the time to read this, and again please help in anyway possible, if you know her at all you KNOW she more then deserves the help and if you do not know her, I hope you feel like you do know her enough now to know that she deserves all the help that is given.

 

I have Faith my Mom will handle this like she has handled all the other hurdles in her life, and beat it! But every prayer helps!

 

Again Thank you.

Richard, LOVING Son of my WONDERFUL Mom Lynnette & Dad Johnny!

story:
About Rich

It's been a long road to this point. Genetically shortsheeted and running out of time and resources, Rich's jaw is in serious need of help.

To learn more about Rich and the journey so far, please take a look at his blog.

What I Need & What You Get

Basically, I need money. Lots of it. Or donations of a surgeon's time or a dentist's time. But for the purposes of this campaign, my family and I need the funds required to add a new implant into my upper jaw.

The implant, crown, and time away from work to recouperate will end up running about $3,500 and the cost of the extraction surgery that is already floating on a credit card is another $1,500.

Every little bit will help keep us out of bankrupcy.

Contributors will get one of a few things.

  • A hand-written thank you card, signed by each member of my family.
  • A laminated bookmark with some of my favorite quotes printed on it.
  • A custom airbrushed T-shirt (you provide the idea, I provide the inspiration and brushwork)
  • A custom airbrushed Hoodie (you provide the idea, I provide the inspiration and brushwork)
  • other perks also available

The Impact

This will mean a world of difference to me and my family. If we raise enough to meet the goal of $5,000, our immediate worries will very nearly be washed away. If we raise more and are fortunate enough to raise enough for more work on my jaw, it will keep me healthy and strong so I can keep supporting my family.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can't contribute, not even $5, it's OK. You can still help by getting the word out to your friends and co-workers. Remember, we're trying to improve the quality of life for Rich, so let's get the word out.

story:
Hi!  I'm Jessica and I'll be 7-years old on June 20th.  All kids my age go to camp.  Except for me.

Summer is coming up soon which means I'll be stuck at home with my mom.  Yuck!  I hate being at home while my mom is working on her "writing".  I want to be at camp like the rest of my friends but she can't afford to send me.  She must not be very good at writing because she doesn't make a lot of money. She should be a rock star instead because she is the best singer ever!

Run-A-Muck-Day Camp at the YMCA at Cypress Creek

YMCA Day Camp is a fun and happy place for childrent to enjoy their summer break. Camp kids get a summer filled with games, sports, swimming, arts and crafts, field trips and much more! Camp runs in week long sessions throughout the summer with a fun theme each week.

SESSIONS: THEME:
June 10-14 (Show Us Your Camp Spirit)
June 17-21 (Let the Games Begin) 
June 25-28 (Adventures in Neverland) 
July 1-5 (Wipe Out!) 
July 8-12 (Ultimate Warrior Week) 
July 15-19 (Rolling Out the Red Carpet) 
July 22-26 (The Circus is Coming to Town) 
July 29-August 2 (Filthy Fun) 
August 5-9 (Gadgets & Gizmos Galore) 
August 12-16 (Hocus Pocus) 
August 19-24 (CFF-Camp Friends Forever) 

Weekly Fees: $190

Are You Too Poor to Help?

I completely understand!  You're probably a writer, too.  Maybe you can help me instead by sharing this page!  Forward it to a friend.  A rich friend, if you have one.

story:
If you’re a competitive athlete:

there are at least three reasons why you need better sleep than you’re getting now:

1.  You can’t train hard if you don’t recover between sessions, and much of your recovery happens while you’re sleeping

2.  You need Human Growth Hormone to convert protein into muscle, and 2/3 of your HGH gets secreted during slow-wave deep sleep.  No deep sleep, no HGH, not much muscle building

3.  You lose focus if you’re not sleeping, and every competitor knows that maintaining your focus is crucial when the competition heats up. 


You think you’re sleeping well.  You’re not.

We know what you’re thinking.  Probably something like, “Hey – I work out pretty hard and I don’t have any trouble falling asleep.”

Right.

Ask yourself these questions:

  • Have I hit a plateau in my work-outs?  Just can’t break through to the next level?
  • Has my concentration drifted during a game or competition?  Have I lost focus during a morning of tennis or basketball, while trying to conserve my energy during a long run, or while trying to preserve proper form when lifting weights?
  • Do I walk around feeling more sore than I’d like for longer than I’d like after an aggressive workout or competition?

Any “Yes” answers?  It’s time to evaluate not only how much you’re sleeping, but also how well you’re sleeping.


Your trainer was right: train hard, eat right and SLEEP

Those are the three pillars of fitness.

  • Can you imagine a workout regimen that didn’t include exercise? 
  • How about one that didn’t include careful nutrition?
  • Guess what: if you’re not paying the same amount of attention to your sleep, you’re shooting your fitness program in the foot.


If you seriously want a competitive advantage in your athletic activities, consider this:

Sleep is the Final Frontier of Fitness

What does the fitness landscape look like for most athletes?

  • There are lots of people advising you how to train better and more productively. 


  • And lots of people advising you how to eat better and more productively. (PS: Studies show that with poor sleep, your body craves processed carbohydrates and then you gain weight.)


Who’s there to help you sleep better and more productively?


We are!  And we want your help

We’ve developed a nutrition drink that just might be the perfect way to end the day for an athlete.

                          

It’s a 2 ½ oz. drink called Food for Sleep.  It’s made of:

  • Montmorency tart cherry juice (naturally rich in antioxidants and anthocyanins) 

  • A whey protein that’s high in tryptophan (legendary for helping you sleep)

There are clinical trials published in peer-reviewed journals that demonstrate that these foods promote longer and better sleep.

And you probably already know that tart cherry juice has been shown to enhance muscle recovery after vigorous exercise.

So…  Food for Sleep helps you sleep longer, sleep better and recover faster from your exercise. (And it even provides 5 grams of high-quality protein.)

AWESOME!!!


Be the first to get the new & improved version!

We’re making Food for Sleep even better!  Here’s how:

1.  We’re improving the flavor!  We’ve figured out how to improve the taste without adding additional sugar or interfering with its effectiveness.  (We’d tell you how, but then we’d have to hire you…)

2.  We’re getting it NSF Sports Certified!  Believe it or not, we’ve been getting inquiries from several professional baseball teams and a professional basketball team.  Their athletes are asking for this, but can’t take it until we get it certified (assuring them that among other things, they won’t flunk a drug test…).  But we weren’t kidding when we said that this is a POTENT TOOL TO ENHANCE ATHLETIC PERFORMANCE.

3. We’re manufacturing more!  Because we’re almost SOLD OUT of our initial batch.


Need more?  Here a few testimonials:


Does anyone that’s normal use this stuff?

You mean, people who aren’t competitive athletes?  You bet.  Here are a few comments from them:

So no more delays!  Pick a perk, tell your friends, and let us help you score your personal bests.

Do it now!



Frequently Asked Questions:

How does Food for Sleep compare to other things I could take for sleep?

Like many of you, we’ve had trouble sleeping for a long time. When we looked for help, we found two types of sleep aids:

  • Sleep aids that don’t work at all (herbs, potions)
  • Other sleep aids that hit us like a freight train (pills, chemicals, drugs)

(Artist representation of the other guys)

There was nothing in the middle. There was no amazing, gentle, sweet dream nectar that wasn’t full of chemicals, drugs, herbs or hocus pocus.

Food for Sleep is:

  • The only drug-free and non-habit-forming sleep aid that is both effective AND gentle
  • The first sleep aid made using food ingredients supported by clinical studies (Montmorency tart cherry juice and a whey protein high in tryptophan)
  • The best for waking up refreshed with no hangover and no side effects (it's foods!)

We developed a little table that compares some of the alternatives.

How do I use it?

Shake well.  Drink the entire bottle a half-hour before you’d like to be asleep.  Shut off your laptop, cell phone, TV, and other sleep disruptors.  Get in bed with something to read.  Sweet dreams.  That’s it.

Can I take Food for Sleep every night? 

Remember that it's just food - and published clinical trials have shown no issues with consuming tart cherry juice or whey protein daily. 

Does it need to be refrigerated? 

No, but some of our users report that they enjoy Food for Sleep chilled. Cool! 

How does it taste? 

It's wicked tart! (Sorry - we're from Boston.) The tart cherry juice plus whey protein would taste better if we added sugar, but our customers persuaded us that they didn't want any extra calories. Funders of our Indiegogo campaign will be the first to taste the new and improved flavor, with no decrease in efficacy and no added sugar.

What if something happens and I have to stay awake after drinking Food for SleepTM?

Then you’ll stay awake. It’s not a sedative – it just simulates your body’s natural processes that lead to sleep.  


Can I travel with it?

Yes. When we were interviewing people, everyone asked for something small enough to fit in a briefcase or a purse.  We also learned that a lot of you travel for business, and you have to deal with the TSA’s rules about what you can carry in your luggage.  The limit is 3 oz. bottles, and ours is 2 ½ oz. bottle.  We’ve gone through the scanners with as many as eight bottles in our carry-on luggage – no problem.

Is it recyclable?

Yes.  It took a bit of work, but we found a recyclable bottle that’s sturdy enough to handle our magic hot-fill process.


Who we are – the team


Bob Jones:  Bob has been in the field of medical nutrition for about two decades. His interest has always been in creating scientifically sound products that address specific conditions, using nutrition rather than drugs. Helping people get a good night’s sleep really has Bob excited: sleep is so fundamental to our health, our well-being and maybe even to our sanity. There’s a huge need to help people sleep without drugs. Bob is excited to be working on just that, and to be doing it with a talented and enthusiastic team.

In addition to this company, Bob has launched three prior companies in medical nutrition, working in areas such as diabetes, weight management and more. All of those companies were with staff and faculty at Harvard Medical School, and led to consumer products that were sold through retail pharmacies. At other times, Bob has served as CEO of Vitasoy USA (a management turn-around), worked as a principal in a strategy consulting firm, and he's held sales and marketing positions at Abbott Laboratories and Baxter International. Bob has degrees from Princeton University (biology) and MIT Sloan (management). After hours, he plays in a blues band, he's a springboard diver and an enthusiastic motorcyclist.

Jason Paruthi, MD is our Senior Market Manager at Food for Sleep. Although Jason rocked his way through Boston University, BU Medical School and a residency and research program at Harvard Medical School, the poor guy was bitten by the entrepreneurial bug. As you know, this is rarely fatal, but it’s usually incurable. As a published researcher in obesity and diabetes, Jason spent a lot of time working in hospitals. He saw that his patients constantly complained of trouble sleeping, but they were very concerned about the side effects associated with sleeping pills. One thing led to another, and he found his way to our little company. We’re now lucky to have him as part of our team, meeting many of you and growing our business.


Risks & Challenges

We’ve gone through our first manufacturing process already, and we have been listening to early users and compiling a list of improvements to make ever since we launched. We have our manufacturer lined up and are ready with recipes to improve the flavor as well.

However, there is always the potential for unforeseen issues with our supplier or manufacturers that could lead to delays. We will do our best to avoid these and help you and all our happy customers sleep well again as quickly as possible.
