story:
Hello my name James Spain I am a husband and a father of three. In 2005 my beautiful wife gave birth to our second child. We knew what to expect, or so we thought. The initial experience came very quick her water broke and within a half hour my second daughter was born. She was a beautiful baby girl. All was well and there was nothing that was obvious to cause concern. Still I felt an unease that was like a ghost sending a chill through the room.

About ten minutes had gone by and I could clearly see that something was not quite right. Lupe's responses were somehow different and anyone else might have left it at the fact that she had just given birth. I knew though, that wasn't what it was. I knew that there was something else wrong. At that point I had no idea how serious it would be.

I went out to the lobby to where the nurses were stationed. I spoke with the woman behind the desk, explaining my concern. Two women that had come over to the desk immediately came out of their station to go to the room. They could see the desperation on my face and knew I was scared. I was hopeful that I had acted in time and grateful that I did not have to argue with them to get results. I followed closely behind them to make sure they would do everything in their power to figure out what the problem was. I knew that Lupe was not out of the woods yet.

The nurses went into the room first and as they entered I approached behind them. I went to Lupe and began speaking to her. She was barely hanging on. It was then that Lupe told the nurses she thought she had peed and she could feel she was wet. One the women went to the foot of the bed. She took hold of the sheet and bgan to draw it back. All the while I was trying to keep Lupe from losing conciousness. She lifted the sheet and I saw terror on her face. I looked down in just enough time to what she had saw. There was a pool of blood resting on the bed between Lupe's legs. Her cervix had gotten torn during the birth.

She had bled out so much her blood pressure was 40 over 20. It took twelve pints of blood and three pints of plasma to keep her alive. She spent the next two three days in ICU and uderwent two surgeries. It was the scariest time of my life. Thank God that she is still with us today.

I am trying to gather the $14000 I have left in the medical bills that were incurred our insurance did not cover. I have been getting my paychecks garnished for the last three years and have paid over $12000 dollars into the bills. I am at this point under extreme financial distress and will not be able to afford to pay for a place to live for my family if the garnishments don't stop soon. 

I do not have anything to offer in return except to for you to know I am a hard working man. I have had the same job at walmart for ten years. I am truly desperate to stop my garnishments. I did not get my debt through credit cards, buying cars, or TVs and other frivilous purchases. I want to be able to provide for my family with an honest wage and give my children the best life I can.

story:
A multidisciplinary, multifaceted team is the perfect match to STARME.IO's project. We care about wellness and work to share it through an innovative project: the perfect tool to keep record of techniques, practice and experience and to share knowledge anywhere, anytime you desire.

This is important to us:

  • we believe in KNOWLEDGE should be universal, especially in the health sector;
  • we believe in COOPERATION as sharing information and connecting with different professionals is the path toward the future;
  • we believe in holistic approach BEYOND the actual DUALISM of standardization vs personalization, of mind vs heart, of science vs art;
  • we believe in EFFICIENCY to strive to best medical result.

It is our dream to CHANGE THE WORLD OF HEALTH THROUGH SHARING AND CONNECTING.

 

If you care you share!

 

Our Project

StarMe.io is an Integrated Web Platform and Professional App. It is going to start as an App for Health Operators, starting from Kinesiologists, but its goals are way beyond that. Everyone of us can be part of StarMe.io and benefit from it!

A Service for Health Operators

StarMe.io is an app for professional work: patient records, work organization, statistics and much more. With a simple and rapid user interface StarMe.io gives you access to the best techniques available, ready to be used in your professional work.

A Showcase for your Activity

Continuous improvement is the key to personal and professional achievements and discoveries. Starme.io gives you the possibility to advertise your activity and to share it with a community of professionals. Reach out to a community of peers, keen for more knowledge and more understanding.

A Support for Schools and Associations

Health education is the key to the well being of every individual. Education comes from training and knowledge. Starme.io supports schools and associations to advertise courses and educational programs. With a selected audience of professionals, Starme.io offers you just the right community for your activities.

A Common Language

Cooperation and connection are keys to personal, professional and social development. But A a Common Language is necessary! Starme.io's blog and dictionary, its procedures and techniques can be modified and approved by the Starme.io community of professionals. Starme.io is the platform for sharing and building a common path for understanding.

A New Source of Revenue

Starme.io rewards every contributor to the platform! If you have a new life-changing technique you want to share and spread to the world, you have come to the right place: add the technique to our database and we are going to reward you based on its use in our community.

And Much More

Starme.io's goals are wide ranging and new projects are already starting up from this platform. From publications of the most interesting statistics of the platform, through new courses and educational projects and even to the organization of clinics, Starme.io is a brand that aims to deeply change the way we consider health.

 

It's your time NOW to make the difference and build up with us YOUR future HEALTH dimension.

If you care you share!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We offer you not just to be part of a project raising world best vibrations but also we give you the opportunity to reserve yourself a lifetime access to the knowledge created in our system or just create the best new world to come.

To make it happen we would need to raise at least $ 30,000. This would cover initial IT and management costs to release the product on the market.

Great perks are available too!!

First of all, supporters are going to show on STARME.IO's website and in our Hall of Fame in our new head offices. More than that, you are going to be able to choose either to receive the SPECIAL EDITION STARME.IO'S T-SHIRT...

Or... the magnificent STARME.IO'S HOODIE!

And, last but not least, you can even get the access to one of our Operator's Packages, with the possibility to get a Lifetime access to our platform.

 

Aren't you curios to know how it is going to grow?

If you care you share!

 

Who We Are

HELP US HELP SENIOR ATHLETES

Thousands of men and women senior athletes are forced to stop playing sports prematurely due to injuries and pain that could have been completely avoided if they knew how to "reset their bodies."

I'm Dori O'Rourke, an avid senior athlete and senior sports proponent and I'm partnering with senior fitness specialist and senior sports expert, Kirsten Cummings to co-author this ground-breaking book designed to show senior athletes how to reset their bodies so they can enjoy a lifetime of sports and play. 

Kirsten and I have both been athletes our entire lives and we love sports, especially senior sports.  To see athletes get hurt and be forced to stop playing is heartbreaking to us ... especially when it could have been avoided! 

With your help, we can show senior athletes the 5 simple things they can do to get their bodies in a position to play for the rest of their lives. 

Playing sports isn't just for fun, the ability to move our bodies literally helps keep us alive.  When we stop moving, our bodies start dying.  That's why playing sports is one of the greatest ways to live a long, happy, healthy life.


HOW YOU CAN HELP

  • Contribute to the project - take advantage of any of the great perks we have listed on the right side of this page as our THANK YOU!

  • Spread the word - Help us get the word out about our campaign by telling all your friends and social media buddies.  Please send the website address (URL) of this IndieGoGo page with a heartfelt endorsement to all the people you know.  It will be a HUGE HELP!

  • Use the book as a fundraiser - If you're connected with any organizations that want to raise funds, contact us to discuss how we can TEAM UP!

  • Use the IndieGoGo share tools to make sharing EASY!


HOW WE’LL USE THE MONEY

Raising $2,500 is our starting point because that will cover the basic photos, cover design, illustrations, and printing costs.

We'd like to raise at least $10,000 though so we can get more detailed illustrations, print more copies, and build a website that includes BONUS VIDEOS for book readers. 

If our dreams were to really come true, we'd raise over $25,000 which would give us the money for a nationwide publicity campaign and the ability to help even more amazing seniors athletes! 

“People do not quit playing because they grow old;
they grow old because they quit playing.”
 
~ Oliver Wendell Holmes


DID YOU KNOW?

  • An American turns 50 every 7 seconds – that’s more than 12,500 new “seniors” every day (US Census)

  • 77 million people were born between 1946 and 1964 – which is defined as the baby boomer era (US Census)

  • By 2015, people aged 50 and over will represent 45% of the US population (AARP)

  • 82% of adults over 50 who use the internet research health and wellness online (ImmersionActive)

  • Life expectancy in the US is consistently increasing – people aged 65 and over have grown from 3 million in 1900 (4% of the population) to about 35 million in 2000 (12%), and experts estimate that more than 50 million Americans – about 17% of the population – will be 65 or older in 2020 (Wikipedia)


WHY SENIOR ATHLETES NEED THIS BOOK

Senior Athletes: Reset Your Body … or BUST!
How to Reset Your Body Back to Its Natural State
So You Can Enjoy a Lifetime of Sports and Play

Adults turning 50 can now look forward to playing sports for another 30, 40 or even 50 years. Isn't that amazing!

Unfortunately though, while it’s completely realistic for men and women to be able to enjoy playing sports and other recreational activities for their entire lives, many seniors won’t.

That’s because many seniors will find themselves limited by pain and injuries that will gradually get worse with time, forcing them to give up one sport and activity after another, in what appears to be the inevitable result of old age.

BUT, the truth is, most pain and injuries are NOT DUE TO OLD AGE, they’re the direct result of a body that has lost its "natural position" – something that is COMPLETELY PREVENTABLE given the right knowledge, training, and support.

As we get older, it’s not age that is causing our physical problems, it’s the daily activities of life that have gradually led our bodies to become more and more off track.

While our bodies do a masterful job of adapting and compensating, this can only last so long before one compensation after another eventually puts us into such a compromised position that pain and injury are the result. In other words ... we BUST!

The GREAT NEWS is, we can dramatically prevent pain, reduce injuries, and increase our recovery time by simply “resetting our bodies.”

In Senior Athletes: Reset Your Body … or BUST! we’re going to show senior athletes the warning signs they need to know about and provide the information they need to recover the alignment and balance they had when they were younger.

With this book, senior athletes will truly be able to look forward to enjoying a lifetime of sports and play!


THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

Senior athletes are our passion and we’re committed to helping men and women senior athletes play sports for as long as they'd like. 

But, we couldn’t help all the senior athletes we want to help without your help.  So, from the depths of our hearts to yours, THANK YOU, THANK YOU, THANK YOU for joining our efforts and supporting this very worthwhile project


ABOUT THE AUTHORS

DORI O’ROURKE

  • Founder/CEO, Be Golfthentic!
  • LPGA “Life” Member, with 25+ Years Service and Teaching Experience
  • Board Member, National Senior Women’s Basketball Association
  • Former General Manager/Head Golf Professional, Mission Bay Golf Resort, San Diego, CA
  • Author, I Found the Golf God, 10 Secrets for Golfing Success
  • Author, Custom-Fit YOUR Golf Swing, Go Beyond Swing Methods & Find YOUR Best Swing
  • BA in Physical Education, Sports Medicine track, with an emphasis in business, psychology and communication, University of the Pacific, Stockton, CA

KIRSTEN CUMMINGS

  • Founder/CEO, National Senior Women’s Basketball Association
  • Basketball Coach and Personal Trainer Specializing in Senior Athletes
  • 14-Year Professional Basketball Player
  • USA National Team, ’85 and ‘86
  • 2 -Time Kodak All-American, 1st Team 1985
  • BA in Psychology, University of Long Beach, Long Beach, CA
  • Masters Degree in Biomechanics, San Diego State University, San Diego, CA


FAQ'S

How can I contribute?

Just click on the buttons that say "Claim This Perk” or “Contribute Now”.

Can I write a check?

IndieGoGo does not support checks.  Instead, you can make a secure payment with your credit card or PayPal account.  If you are not comfortable paying online, please contact us to make other arrangements.

When will I receive my book(s)?

Senior Athletes: Reset Your Body ... or BUST! is scheduled for release the end of July.  You will receive your copy shortly after its release.

Are shipping fees included?

YES!  Shipping is included for all orders shipped within the United States.  Please add $5 for Canadian orders and $15 for other International orders.

Contact Information

Feel free to contact Dori through her www.BeGolfthentic.com website or Kirsten through the National Senior Women's Basketball Association website at www.PlayNSWBA.org.


THANK YOU AGAIN FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story: My name is Gloria Castano, I am the proud mother of Stephen Castano. Stephen was born on June 22,1989. A healthy and beautiful boy, he was our pride and joy. Stephen had a normal childhood until he was 3 years old, when he was diagnosed with Morquio Syndrome. Our lives collapsed when he heard the news, but we were determined to make the best that Stephen could be. Stephen had to go through a number of surgeries to get his neck and head well supported on his body, his body did not develop the same way other children develop, due to his syndrome he has small stature, and his short neck became a problem when it came to his breathing. In 2001 while on vacation Stephen acquire pneumonia, he was hospitalized in July 4th in Charlotte , NC, from there he was transferred to Hackensack , NJ (where we live). While in the hospital he suffered a stroke. The doctors' prognosis were not very good and they told me and his father to be prepared for the worse. He had to go through another serie of surgeries including the tracheotomy to help him to breath and a surgery to remove the blood clot from his brain. Stephen remained in coma until April 2002 when he finally woke up!!! Stephen was a warrior, he was a fighter, he was in love with life! He fought his syndrome, his pneumonia, the stroke and the doctors prognosis with all the strength of his being. To date Stephen remains on a respirator and since 2001 he has been wheelchair bound, but his spirit and love for life have not changed in one bit. Stephen has overcome a lot of obstacles in his life. I want to establish this campaing for Stephen because he is in need of a minivan that is handicapped accessible, the aproximate price for this minivan is $55,000.00. Stephen also needs a bigger room to keep all of his medical equipment, (respirator, suction machine, oxigen generator, humidifier, etc). Extending his room would cost around $35,000.00. The rest of the money will be utilized to get a couple of the books that he writes edited and published. The impact of this campaing will have are: Stephen quality of life will improve because he will have more mobility around his room and he will be able to visit places where has never been before. The other impact is his book are published a lot of people will understand the many blessings they have in their lives. If the campaing doesn't reach the goal, we will use the amount we raise for one of his needs. On behalf of Stephen and our family I want to thank each and everyone of you for your support and your generosity. We would like to ask you to share this campaing with your friends, family and co-workers.

story:
Our Story

I have been practicing Bikram yoga since I was 15 years old, and it has allowed me to exceed my own false limitations, and to lead a better life mentally, emotionally, physically, in every aspect. I yearn to further my understanding, my practice, and my Bikram yoga way of life, as well as to improve the lives of others by spreading this yoga to as many people as possible. I grew up with only my mother; I have never known my father. My mother always provided for me as best she could, but being a waitress, we were always living paycheck to paycheck. I am now twenty years old, and I'm a waitress as well. I am attending a community college, taking classes towards my general Associates degree, but I know in my heart that all I really want to be doing is spreading Bikram yoga, and in turn spreading health and happiness.  I am asking for assistance from anyone who is willing to help me to achieve my dream: the privilege of becoming a dedicated and exuberant teacher of the wonderful healing yoga practice. 
The total cost of Bikram Yoga Teacher Training comes to $10,900;   $7,000 for the training, and $3,900 for the mandatory housing.
The training consists of nine weeks immersed in an in-depth study of Bikram Yoga with an amazing staff of senior teachers. The course, leading to a certificate of completion, introduces the student to the basic knowledge needed to begin teaching this powerful healing yoga.

The course covers asanas (yoga postures), anatomy, therapeutic applications and health benefits of Yoga, nutrition, philosophy of Yoga, Bikram's Posture Clinic, and the Bikram Yoga dialogue. Through dedicated practice and study of the 26 yoga asanas, the student will expand their knowledge of the Bikram Method and prepare to teach it.


Nothing could be more fulfilling in my life than to complete this intensive yoga training; I am determined to raise the money to attend.


The Impact

The impact that this yoga has on people who give 110% effort to their practice is profound. Bikram Yoga helps balance the emotions in several ways.

Physiologically, regular practice harmonizes the nervous and endocrine systems, two systems which figure heavily in emotional well-being.

In addition, practicing Bikram Yoga cultivates the mental faculties of  faith, self-control, concentration, determination,  and patience.  As we become more aware of our inner life, we notice how events, interactions, and even the atmospheric pressure effect us. When we are aware, we can exercise choice in our response. This helps us balance our emotional life.

Bikram's yoga is very good for toning the reproductive system as it directly affects the reproductive organs and the endocrine glands--pituitary, pineal and thyroid gland in particular. The women's cycle becomes regular; complaints of irregularity and PMS decrease.

Bikram yoga stabilizes the blood pressure. This quick response of the blood pressure is one of the most telling demonstrations of Yoga's ability to regulate and synchronize body systems. If you are tested about a week after starting Yoga, you may see a slight rise in pressure. Don't be alarmed. By the second week, that pressure will be normal or close to normal and will stay there as long as you maintain your yoga regimen.

The yoga is done in a warm room which promotes relaxation of the muscles and nerves, and is the type of exercise that you can do with as little or as much intensity as appropriate for your needs.

In other words, you can do each posture with less effort if you're concerned about overexertion triggering an attack, or you can sit down and rest whenever you need to during the class.

It will relax your mind and help let go of tensions, toxins and negativity. It also strengthens your heart and lungs, improving your lung function.  You will breathe easier and deeper than you ever have before.

There are countless benefits to this yoga practice and I am determined to spread it to as many people as I can.

With regular practice, this yoga is life altering. It is extremely beneficial and it is truly a blessing.

What We Need & What You Get

The total cost of Bikram Yoga Teacher Training comes to $10,900;   $7,000 for the training, and $3,900 for the mandatory housing.

The training consists of nine weeks immersed in an in-depth study of Bikram Yoga with an amazing staff of senior teachers. The course, leading to a certificate of completion, introduces the student to the basic knowledge needed to begin teaching this powerful healing yoga.

The course covers asanas (yoga postures), anatomy, therapeutic applications and health benefits of Yoga, nutrition, philosophy of Yoga, Bikram's Posture Clinic, and the Bikram Yoga dialogue. Through dedicated practice and study of the 26 yoga asanas, the student will expand their knowledge of the Bikram Method and prepare to teach it.


Nothing could be more fulfilling in my life than to complete this intensive yoga training; I am determined to raise the money to attend. If I do not reach my goal here, I will simply continue to save every penny until I am finally able to afford the teacher training.


Other Ways You Can Help

I am asking anyone who is willing to help me to reach my goal to spread the word!  I not only want to raise money to attend Bikram's teacher training in order to further my own yoga practice; even more so, I want to spread health and happiness to others. It truly is a win-win situation! Thank you so much in advance for your help.

story:
Fund Ping’s Lab at Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai -  Help people living with Parkinson’s disease to find hope.

Caring for people with diseases as complex as Parkinson’s disease is difficult when funding is limited. We are striving to help.  Dr. Ping-Yue Pan is an outstanding Research Assistant Professor in the Neurology Department at Mount Sinai. She is also the recipient of Lucien Cote Early Investigator Award by the Parkinson’s Disease Foundation. Her research focuses on identifying signaling pathways that are central to Parkinson’s disease using genetic animal models. Ping works alongside with human geneticists, clinicians and talented research staff at Mount Sinai and around the world for the goal of finding novel therapeutic targets.

Show your support to Ping’s research project on a newly identified Parkinson’s disease mutation that can lead to effective early intervention.  Your generosity ensures that we will be closer to finding meaningful therapies and even a cure for the disease.

Parkinson's - We're in This Together.

On behalf of all people living with Parkinson’s disease and their loved ones—we thank you from the bottom of our hearts. *All your donations are tax deductible (section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code).

Mount Sinai’s highly specialized and integrated model has allowed us to make some of the greatest advances in Parkinson’s research and care. Not only do our doctors and specialists work hand-in-hand with our scientists, but they are also our researchers. At the Institute our neurologists are Movement Disorder Specialists, Parkinson’s disease experts, and they work collaboratively with scientific and clinical research teams within one holistic environment. Critical observations and insights and highly qualified data from our Clinical Center guide our laboratory and clinical researchers in their efforts.

Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.

Use the Indiegogo share tools!

#DISCLAIMER:The views expressed on this blog&video are my own and do not reflect the views of my employer.

closer to finding meaningful therapies and even a cure for the disease.
Parkinson's - We're in This Together.
On behalf of all people living with Parkinson’s disease and their loved
ones—we thank you from the bottom of our hearts. *All your donations are tax deductible (section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code).
Mount Sinai’s highly
specialized and integrated model has allowed us to make some of the greatest
advances in Parkinson’s research and care.
Not only do our doctors and specialists work hand-in-hand with our scientists,
but they are also our researchers. At the Institute our neurologists are
Movement Disorder Specialists, Parkinson’s disease experts, and they work
collaboratively with scientific and clinical research teams within one holistic
environment. Critical observations and insights and highly qualified data from
our Clinical Center guide our laboratory and clinical researchers in their
efforts. 
 Other Ways You Can HelpGet the word out and make some noise about this campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools!   #DISCLAIMER:The views expressed on this blog&video are my own and do not reflect the views of my employer.

story:
• Made in America - Supports USA Economy - Supports US Troops
  • Highest quality of WHEY protein ingredients 
  • Great value

Thanks for checking out my project. Together with your help we can change the way people today deal with the inconvenience of drinking protein shakes. After a workout at the gym or as a healthy meal replacement, there is finally a product that is easy and convenient to use. We’ve got the designs, flavors, sourced the WHEY protein, and found an American factory that is excited about growing this opportunity with us.... We just need $50,000 to get it going. Please support us at whatever level you're comfortable with. If you’ve got the time though, be sure to read the info below as well, it’s wordy but worth it. Thanks for your support. – Joel!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E2XL9wvUe7Q

 
The HandShake Pouch™ provides consumers with user-friendly way to store and consume everyday beverages. These beverages may include protein shakes, meal replacements and/or any powder beverage that needs to be mixed and shaken before consumption. The patented pouch is a small, lightweight and disposable pouch pre-filled with delicious and nutritious whey protein powder. During or after workout, in the gym, office, at the airport, hotel room or anywhere else, the user just fills the pouch with water or milk, shakes the pouch for 30 seconds and enjoys his/her protein shake without messy blenders or shakers to wash. The used package can then be discarded.
 
 
                                                   
 
 

Why INDIEGOGO
Innovation is our blood and in our product. The HandShakePouch™ team created the product to help individuals live a better life by offering a unique product and solution that will help with weight management and muscle building. We recognize that people are much more busy today and their needs for a healthy meal supplement that is convenient, portable and affordable is important. Our goal is to increase the product line, focus on the marketing and distribution of the product and make the product more accessible for our customers to buy.

Why we need YOUR help
We have put more than a year’s work and effort to create this innovation. With your help we will be able to fulfill customer orders, increase our HandShake product line to offer more flavors and expand beyond protein shakes. The team will use the pledges to create additional pouches as well as additional flavors and embark on an immediate online marketing campaign to acquire customers. We are also working on an exciting opportunity with the US Army to provide our troops with the HandShake Pouch™ as a healthy meal supplement.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZkC8nxnqmdg

Who we are
The Instigo team is composed of 4 entrepreneurs with proven success in health, marketing, legal, finance, Internet and advertising. The team has a global approach to business with experience in the US and International Markets.

Our goal is to raise $50,000

Please become part of the HandShake family, and support us in changing people’s lives with this healthy and convenient product.

 

 

 

 

For the active and busy individual, modernize and simplify the way you store and drink your protein shake!

story:
REVOLUTIONIZING FITNESS.  What does this mean?  REFIT is a fitness concept that challenges the way society views fitness.....more than calorie burning...more than weight loss....more than perfectly toned bodies.  REFIT engages the whole person with a relationship-focused approach to fitness while using positive music and motivational dance choreography.  With the launch of our first-ever DVD, the REFIT team desires to impact the fitness community across the US.  We believe that fitness is for everyone, regardless of size, shape, age or fitness level.  REFIT is inspired by the CHOICE+CHANGE+IMPACT concept: small choices can lead to positive changes, which ultimately leads to inspirational impact in society. We've seen this time and time again and are inspired by the numerous stories of success via REFIT classes.

Finding positive, clean, and culturally relevant music is not an easy task. Furthermore, creating exciting choreography to this music can be equally challenging.....but REFIT has managed to accomplish both. Incorporating faith into our fitness program may pigeon-hole us into certain "Christian-only" segments of society. We reject that possibility and seek to demonstrate that faith-infused fitness can be culturally relevant, fitness-focused, and above all.....an exhilarating experience for ANYONE.

YOUR SUPPORT helps us achieve this goal!  This DVD is a culmination of three years of tears, triumph, hopes and dreams.  We are asking for your help to makes these dreams become a reality! 

BUT WAIT, THERE'S MORE!  If we achieve over our minimum goal of 5k, we're headed towards our bigger dream of launching a REFIT Facilitator program, which would allow individuals to instruct and impact classes in their own communities.  In order to make that program possible, we need a fully functioning website that would offer more user interaction and downloadable material capabilities. Raising $12,000 would get the entire project off the ground...and y'all, the potential of the faciliator program is tremendous!  Once again, it's your help that puts our dreams to flight!

Blessings to you for your support!  To learn more about our crazy dreams please visit:  www.refitrev.com

story:
Who?

Sophie.  Alice.  Doctor George.  You all know her and you all love her.

What?

The Detroit Marathon.  26.2 miles of ghetto fabulous frolicking through the streets of Detroit.  She will cross the Detroit River via the Ambassador Bridge into the safety of the Queens Land (aka Canada), swim back through the icey waters of the Detroit River before climbing the Renaissance Center and then leaping into the air wearing nothing but a flying squirrel suit to safely cross the finish line in front of the Coleman Young Municipal Center.

Where?

The fair city of Detroit, USA 

When?

October 21st

On this day in 1983, the metre was defined as the distance light travels in a vacuum in 1/299,792,458 of a second.  And now it will be forever remembered as the day that Sophie Alice conquered four million, two hundred and nineteen thousand, four hundred and ninety eight and eight tenths centimeters!

How?

Dedication, that's how!  You want something?  You better work for it.  This city is not for the soft or the lazy. Strap on your pearly white shoes, load up on the Gu and you are off!

            

Why oh Why?

We found a perfect 3-bed end of terrace in a *great* up and coming neighborhood for $500! Just kidding, just kidding...

We are raising money to build a permanent Disc Golf course in Detroit's largest city park, Belle Isle. Belle Isle was designed by Frederick Olmsted, who also designed central park in New York, and was once considered the gem of Detroit. It is a currently hugely underutilized space that sits at the crossroads of the region’s major freeways and is easily accessible to over a million people.

       

Disc Golf is a sport that is virtually free to play. A good course pulls in tens of thousands of visitors a year. The city of Detroit has a major void to fill in terms of recreational activities for young people. This would offer a place for the city’s youth to play as well as bring thousands of young people into the city. 

The space that has been earmarked for the Disc Golf course on Belle Isle contains over 32 acres of land, a lake, a canal with a covered bridge, a gorgeous view of the city skyline. It has the potential to be turned into a world class course. 

Check out the progress we have made in the past year:

  • Detroit Disc Golf TV love
  • Detroit Disc Golf Newspaper love
  • Detroit Disc Golf Facebook love

         

The city is willing, but do not have the funds to construct a course. We have a fundraising tournament slated for the weekend after the marathon. While we have a small army that is preparing the land by mowing, landscaping and cleaning the site, we need to raise nearly $10,000 to install the course.

Soph has generously decided to run the Detroit marathon in support of our cause. Please give generously to her, so she can give generously to us!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Paul 'Sifu Boggie' Brighton.

I began Qi Gong/Chi Kung at the age of 11 years with my main Sifu (Teacher), Sifu Shun Mei Li and his brother Shun Po. I was taught the traditional Taoist/ Daoist (pronounced  DOW-IST) way, which is to learn to heal yourself, to learn to mediate and empower oneself and defend oneself first - then use these skills on others.  (to attack, protect or teach?)

For more than 30 years, I have learnt and continue to learn,  a vast range of Chi Kungs/Qi Gongs (Daoist, Tai Chi, Shaolin and Tibetan) for healing, meditation, self-empowerments, fitness, weight loss and self-defence. 

Also, for over 19 years I have learnt four styles of Tai Chi Chuan for self-healing, self-empowerment and self-defence - the main one I teach is Wudang/Practical Tai Chi Chuan (Cheng Tin-hung lineage) where  my Sifu's are Dan Docherty and Richard Odell.

I have also learnt Shaolin Kung Fu and a Martial Art called Shun-Do for 30 years, which I now teach under Shaolin/Tai Chi Fitness.

I have studied many healing system since 1982. The first was Shun Dao healing system which is the healing side to the Martial system of Shun Do.

Since then I have also learnt and practised Traditional Chinese massage, Reiki (Eastern, Western, Crystal, Tibetan and Shun Styles), Chi Daoist Empowerments and Healing systems, Sun Healing systems, Tai Chi and Chi Kung healing systems and Reflexology, most of these for between 15 and 30 years.

I have studied Daoist and Buddhist philosophies for more than 30 years and can teach these under Taoist/Daoist Mentorship for business and personal use.  I have healed using many types of Reiki and other healing energies, as well as Chinese massage, reflexology and Shun-Dao massage for around 26 years and teach the Energy empowerments in the Energy Workshops and downloads.

I have taught for over 20 years from personal one-to-ones to groups of over 70 people, from 6 year olds to 98 year olds (my oldest ever student!).

I have taught both teachers and pupils in both public and private schools and have done countless health days for councils all over London, as well as businesses.

I have successfully run classes in companies to improve productivity and reduce absenteeism, and have taught groups at residential homes alongside running healing and massage treatments for businesses, homes and health days.

I am also a Universal Mentor for a Qi Gong system called Universal Hero Game and also in the last 5 years I have started Daoism workshops helping to show others better ways to empower their life.

I started  'The Way Of...' back in 2000 as 'The Way Of Healing ' and focused mainly on teaching and workshops though it became apparent to me that with the skills I had obtained I could help both businesses and individuals become the best they can be or even better. Since then with my partner we have gone from strength to strength.

I am also a Universal Mentor at Universal Hero’s under my friend and Chi brother and founder Andrew Morrissey.

As well as being a fellow vitality agent with my other Chi brother, Kyle Vialli, who I have known for a fair number of years, I also happily assist him with running some of his Vitality Events.

My other passions are ice and roller skating, cooking and baking (as I'm a former Baker and Chef of 18 years and have studied Daoist cooking for 15 years which I plan to teach in... The Way Of Food...), being near the sea and nature, and just enjoying life.

They call me 'Boggie' (Martial name meaning Chaos and Calmness) or sometimes 'Sifu' ( which means Farther/Teacher and one who take responsibility for your teachings). I am otherwise know in Daoist and Life Mentor circle's as Sifu Boggie the FUNkey Daoist or just Paul if you prefer!

About: My Empowering Mission...

For the last 10 years I have been successfully teaching on part-time basis doing my workshops and classes while still working in full time job. I wish to now change that and my aim is to teach, heal and coach full time.

To offer workshops and classes in the UK on a full time basis to all who are interested including those who would normally not be in a position to afford it.

I will also create heavily subsidised classes/workshops for people with Autism and the Autistic spectrum, Diabetes and illnesses that are effected by auto immune and nervous system dysfunction which Tai Chi, Qi Gong/Chi Kung and Meditation are known through medical case studies to help and benefit...

By offering  1-2-1's online and online workshops as well as a multitude of video's and programs for business, sports, personal development, spiritual development, healing of oneself and others, care and healing of equine and other animals and pets, plus relaxation techniques, De-stressing techniques etc.

How you can help me help others:

The funding will enable me to upgrade my download video's and produce more video's to the highest standard possible and also help me upgrade my website and reach as many people as possible and therefore reduce the cost of my services.

It will also help enhance my skills and programs to an even higher standard which can then be passed on to many others.

But, as a Buddhist saying goes ‘what goes round comes round’ I also believe you need to give, like for like.

So by donating funds to me for my Mission I will in return give you my knowledge and skills via my current means which are:

Download video's and online 1-2-1 sessions and programs.

These can be for you personally or you can give them to someone else as a unique gift.

Also another return is that I will happily promote you or your business to my 15000+ contacts on Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, my website and fan page.

By helping fund my mission I will be able to help as many people as I possibly can while helping you, or maybe a friend and your business.

 What I need and what you get in return:

In total I need $73500 which would fund me for 18 months, allow me to create funded Autistic workshops etc. and also pay for the professional filming of my new online video's.

This a breakdown of how the funds will be used:

$77,000 will allow me to focus purely on setting up workshops, events, classes and 1-2-1's in the UK of Tai Chi, Qi Gong/Chi Kung, Reiki (5 different styles) and Daoist Chi empowerments/Attuning, self-massage techniques, Meditation, Daoist Life coaching, De-stressing techniques, and relaxation techniques etc.

It will also allow me to set up the funded workshops which are part of my giving back to others project.

It will allow me to set up as many funded workshops as possible, so I will be able to create as many types of workshops for people with different conditons and to do this possibly on a weekly basis over the next year.

Allow me to develop and present my online 1-2-1's and online workshops.

$3,000 will allow me to professionally film edit and produce over 18 hours of video footage that can become 1-2-1 videos of Tai chi, Qigong, Daoist life coaching, meditation, relaxation techniques...etc.

Like I have already said, if you are funding me I feel the need to do something in return...

So whether you send me $5, $20, $45, $50 or $500 I, in return, will share my knowledge and skills with you to empower your life, working, sporting, personal and or spiritual development and help enhance your mind, body and spirit in your work, rest and play via a number of video downloads, online programs both 7 day and 35 day, online 1-2-1's that I can use to share my skills with you on a personal level.

The aim of my skills and my products and services is to help you in any way I can by adapting my skills to your personal needs. So while you’re helping me I am helping you and or your loved ones too.

So what if I don't get the full amount?

Well, I will still help those who have funded me by sharing my services and I will still film my continuing lessons for my online Video's.

Depending on how much I receive, I will put that money into setting up my subsidised funded Workshops as well as my online and UK based workshops and events as well as a new HD web cam for my live Blog TV shows and You Tube video channel.

 

What Impact can this have on many people’s lives?

Having this funding will allow me to set up  workshops for groups like help the aged, Autism, Dyslexia, Asperger, ADHD and other groups that are known to benefit from the knowledge of Tai Chi, QiGong, meditation etc.

It will allow me to create fun and beneficial ways to help and empower as many people as possible in not only the UK but worldwide using my skills in my unique way.

Enable me to Help those who ask for my help whether they can afford it or not.

This funding will allow me to set up the resources to do this and the knock on effect will be beneficial for everyone concerned.

Are there other ways you can help me other than funding?

Yes.  If you personally cannot afford to help fiancé me but would like to help me then you can share this link with your friends and family or people you know who may be able to help raise funds for me.

Don't forget to also use the share tools on Indiegogo to share and promote my mission  if you choose to accept it as your mission too.

Finally you can also ‘like or share’ on my links of below:

Website      www.thewayof.co.uk

Fan Page      www.facebook.com/2TheWayOf

Blog TV         http://www.blogtv.com/people/SifuBoggieTheWayOf

You Tube      http://www.youtube.com/user/SifuBoggie

Take care and thank you with whatever help you can give me.

Love Chi and Shen,

Paul (Sifu Boggie) Brighton

It will allow me to set up as many funded workshops as possible, so I will be able to create as many types of workshops for people with different conditons and to do this possibly on a weekly basis over the next year.
Allow me to develop and present my online 1-2-1's and online workshops.
$3,000 will allow me to professionally film edit and produce over 18 hours of video footage that can become 1-2-1 videos of Tai chi, Qigong, Daoist life coaching, meditation, relaxation techniques...etc.
Like I have already said, if you are funding me I feel the need to do something in return...
So whether you send me $5, $20, $45, $50 or $500 I, in return, will share my knowledge and skills with you to empower your life, working, sporting, personal and or spiritual development and help enhance your mind, body and spirit in your work, rest and play via a number of video downloads, online programs both 7 day and 35 day, online 1-2-1's that I can use to share my skills with you on a personal level.
The aim of my skills and my products and services is to help you in any way I can by adapting my skills to your personal needs. So while you’re helping me I am helping you and or your loved ones too.
So what if I don't get the full amount?
Well, I will still help those who have funded me by sharing my services and I will still film my continuing lessons for my online Video's.
Depending on how much I receive, I will put that money into setting up my subsidised funded Workshops as well as my online and UK based workshops and events as well as a new HD web cam for my live Blog TV shows and You Tube video channel.
 
What Impact can this have on many people’s lives?
Having this funding will allow me to set up  workshops for groups like help the aged, Autism, Dyslexia, Asperger, ADHD and other groups that are known to benefit from the knowledge of Tai Chi, QiGong, meditation etc.
It will allow me to create fun and beneficial ways to help and empower as many people as possible in not only the UK but worldwide using my skills in my unique way.
Enable me to Help those who ask for my help whether they can afford it or not.
This funding will allow me to set up the resources to do this and the knock on effect will be beneficial for everyone concerned.
Are there other ways you can help me other than funding?
Yes.  If you personally cannot afford to help fiancé me but would like to help me then you can share this link with your friends and family or people you know who may be able to help raise funds for me.
Don't forget to also use the share tools on Indiegogo to share and promote my mission  if you choose to accept it as your mission too.
Finally you can also ‘like or share’ on my links of below:
Website      www.thewayof.co.uk
Fan Page      www.facebook.com/2TheWayOf
Blog TV         http://www.blogtv.com/people/SifuBoggieTheWayOf
You Tube      http://www.youtube.com/user/SifuBoggie
Take care and thank you with whatever help you can give me.
Love Chi and Shen,
Paul (Sifu Boggie) Brighton

story:
The cure is in the love handles: help Florentin fight Parkinson's disease with stem cells from his own body and overcome the obstructionist policies of the FDA

Who is Florentin?

Florentin Krause is 63 years old and lives in Richmond, California. As an adventurous 19-year old with a dream of earning a doctorate in the US, he came to California from Germany some 44 years ago and entered graduate school in physical chemistry at UC Berkeley. Florentin fell in love with California, its mixture of cultures, its natural beauty and possibility for outdoors activities, and its dynamic progressive social and environmental movements. He felt at home on his skis in the snowy Sierra Nevada, and he enthusiastically kayaked California's rivers and coasts. He chose to stay.

Florentin's graduate studies were supported by grants from US and German foundations. Upon receiving his doctorate, he endeavored to repay his debt to society by choosing a path of environment-and public interest-oriented research and activism over a better-paying career in industry.

Florentin has a knack for explaining complex themes with humor and inspires people with his clarity of vision. Early in his work he led the development of a national energy plan for Germany that showed a path for simultaneously phasing out nuclear power while also substantially reducing fossil fuel emissions. The plan, known in Germany as Energiewende, was first adopted by the Green party there and is now the term used for Germany's official energy program under Chancellor Merkel.

In subsequent years, Florentin became a leading international advocate of climate friendly energy policies. He participated in UN scientific panels on global warming and was instrumental in developing the concept of a global warming limit. His testimonies in congressional and parliamentary hearings in the US and Europe were a frequent thorn in the side of the fossil fuel lobby.

Over time, Florentin became preoccupied with the fact that human beings tend to act in self-destructive ways even when faced with clear evidence of existential threats to humanity. He deepened his studies of psychology and spirituality, which resulted in a shift of personal focus towards consciousness-raising groups practicing inquiry into the deeper truth of one's personal experience. It is his wish and intention to continue working in this capacity for many more years.

Enter Parkinson's

In 2005, Florentin noticed a recurring tremor in his arm after exercise. When he went to see his doctor, he was diagnosed with Parkinson's disease. According to his doctors, this diagnosis meant an unstoppable descent into ever greater stiffness, slowness, tremoring and shaking, loss of balance, and unsteady, precarious gait. Eventually, walking from the car to the store would become a major ordeal. Putting on a shirt might take 15 min., and typing or using an iPhone would become a totally frustrating affair as his fingers kept tapping uncontrollably. At the same time, his hand writing ability would become greatly diminished.

Add to this a progressive weakening of voice, freezing of facial expression, and chronic muscular pain, and one might begin to understand why one Parkinson patient said: “this disease is like getting buried alive in your own body.”

To make things worse, the disease can also cause depression and affect cognitive functioning, producing brain fog, difficulty calling up words, slowness of speech and thinking, and loss of memory. As such, the disease is a threat to Florentin’s livelihood and continued ability to work. Given Florentin's lifelong enjoyment of the outdoors and all of sports like skiing, diving, and kayaking, the loss of mobility is strongly felt by him.

Conventional medicine has no cure

Conventional medicine has no cure for Parkinson's disease. The last significant pharmaceutical innovation in treating the disease occurred some 40 years ago. Available drugs do nothing more than temporarily mask the symptoms. Available medications eventually lose their effectiveness and often end up producing the very symptoms of Parkinson's disease as side effects. The uncontrollable weaving and bobbing and writhing seen in many patients and made notorious by Michael J Fox are not a symptom of the disease, but a side effect of the medications.

What to do?

Throughout his illness, Florentin has not only relied on the drugs of conventional medicine, but has also vigorously pursued alternative medicine approaches including exercise, diet, acupuncture, supplements and surgeries for improving the blood flow to his brain. This has slowed his progression substantially, but after 6 years on the standard pharmaceutical medications, these drugs have begun to lose their effectiveness, and it is time to chart a new course.

One non-drug treatment is implantation of a pair of electrodes deep into the brain, the so-called brain pacemaker. Florentin's two neurology doctors are at odds with each other over whether to recommend this intervention. The procedure is usually recommended as a last resort. It has a 1% failure rate, which is 10 to 100 times greater than that for routine heart surgeries. When the operation fails, one consequence can be loss of cognitive functioning and speech. Even when the surgery succeeds, the leads to the electrodes can break or cause infections.

The way to go: adult stem cells from your own body

For all these reasons, Florentin has been looking elsewhere. He has researched the rapidly evolving field of adult stem cell therapy, and has concluded that this therapy offers a much safer, health promoting alternative based on his own body's intelligence.

The approach consists of extracting fat from one's belly region (specifically, Florentin's love handles), separating the stem cells in the fat with a centrifuge, separating the most potent cell lines (so-called mesenchymal cells), and growing these for several weeks to a population of several hundred million. Once this large number is achieved, the cells are ready for intravenous injection.

The injected cells have a homing capacity. They pick up on the presence of certain proteins that get produced by damaged cells in the brain and other organs and body systems. The stem cells migrate to these sites and secrete various kinds of growth factor proteins that have the effect of repairing cells. They also promote new growth of neurons and other types of cells. Specifically, the injected cells can repair the part of the brain affected by Parkinson's disease.

Increased efficacy

Adult stem cell therapy is now ready for prime time. Until recently, the reported efficacy of adult stem cell treatment was about one third, meaning one out of three patients experienced significant and lasting improvements in their symptoms, such as reductions in tremors, etc.

With the introduction of the much more potent mesenchymal stem cells, and by growing the cells so they can be used in large numbers, the efficacy has risen to more than 90%. In effect, this advanced form pushes the treatment into the most effective portion of its dose-response curve. Also, several clinical trials have shown the safety of using one's own adult fat derived stem cells.

Results reported by patients

One patient Florentin spoke to in person reported these results:

Barely audible, whispering voice – gone; inability to get up from the chair without use of arms – gone; shaking in his right arm – gone; mask-like, frozen face – gone; inability to lie on one side due to chronic pain – gone; arthritic condition in foot – gone. These benefits all occurred within the 1st month after treatment and have persisted so far for one and a half years. His observations were confirmed by his neurologist.

The potency of advanced adult stem cell treatment is further illustrated in a YouTube video about an evangelist in his 70s who had become so ill with Parkinson's that he got ready to die. He had lost his voice and his ability to stand and walk, could no longer perform his daily living tasks and was largely bedridden and in serious pain all the time. In this very severe case, a total of 12 injections were applied over the course of one year. The video shows this man walking down the aisle toward the podium of a large congregation hall with upright posture and a spring in his step and addressing his audience with a strong voice and a demeanor that made him appear 10 years younger. Here is the link:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MQ83VCFe-8U

A big hurdle: the FDA

In view of these improved results, Florentin has decided it is time to get treated. Unfortunately, the Food and Drug Administration has made this advanced form of stem cell treatment illegal and therefore unavailable in the US. The reasoning of the FDA is that as soon as stem cells taken from the body are in any way manipulated before being re-injected, the stem cells become a drug subject to the same multiyear, multimillion dollar testing requirements applied in the case of pharmaceuticals. The minimum time horizon for overcoming these regulatory hurdles is 5-10 years or so. Like many patients, Florentin cannot wait that long.

The current treatment of Parkinson's disease is a moneymaker for big Pharma. The FDA seems to be more interested in protecting the pharmaceutical industry than in advancing the best treatment for patients. One result is that presently, no insurance company covers state-of-the-art stem cell treatments, and people like Florentin are forced to have the injections done abroad. Fortunately, highly competent clinics with US trained doctors do exist in other countries, however, US patients are forced to bear the considerable additional costs of medical travel abroad, which is all the more burdensome when a travel companion is needed.

What Florentin's treatment will look like

The company Florentin will use is called Celltex. Its headquarters are in Houston, Texas, where adult stem cells are grown and banked. Injections are done in modern clinics located in Cancun and Guadalajara, Mexico. The total number of cells used in the treatment is between 500 million and 1 billion or more. To avoid overwhelming the body, the total dose is broken down into multiple injections spaced one to several weeks apart. The minimum treatment consists of three injections, with a recommended number of five in Florentin's case.

The improvements to be expected from the treatment include reductions in all the symptoms described above, though which symptoms improve the most varies greatly from individual to individual. Effects take up to 6 months to show up. To quantify improvements from the treatment, a Parkinson's rating scale will be administered before and after the treatment. Any reduction in the rating scale after injection will mean an improvement and can be expressed as a percentage. Also a video recording will be made before and after.

Benefits beyond Florentin's personal health

Florentin’s friends and colleagues not only wish to help him get better personally, but they also know that Florentin will benefit many others with his ability to write and speak eloquently in public fora including his Yahoo group about this new stem cell treatment and its scientific foundation and FDA status. Donations to Florentin’s campaign will thus also be a contribution to the well-being of other Parkinson patients. 

This orientation also informs the choice of perks offered by the campaign. One of the perks is a phone conversation with Florentin in which contributors can ask any and all questions about his treatment experience. Another perk consists of a report with the before and after test results  and a description of the clinic and staff.

The costs

The charge for extracting, growing and banking the cells is $6000.  The package price for 5 injections is $50,000. To receive these injections, Florentin will need to travel to the clinic twice, respectively for a 16 day stay and then a 9 day stay. The costs of travel for himself and a caretaker companion is $4000 for the two trips. The total cost is thus $60,000.

Florentin has already $16,000, which cover the cell preparation and one injection. He needs to raise $44,000 to pay for his treatment, plus indiegogo fees.

If donations should fall short of this goal, funds will be applied to pay for a lesser number of injections, and a new campaign will be pursued to cover the full number of injections.

A note to Florentin's students

This fundraising campaign is not a campaign of the Ridhwan Foundation or the Ridhwan School, or endorsed by them. It is not intended to solicit donations from Florentin's Ridhwan students. Students can donate if they do so anonymously. Any contribution listed on the site that is recognized as originating from one of Florentin's students will be returned by the Team, and any associated perks will be canceled. The Team also asks that contributions from Florentin's teacher colleagues be made anonymously. These procedures have been adopted to protect and support the integrity of the teacher-student relationship.

story:
The LYLH Linda Karner Memorial 5K is a 5K run in honor of the most incredible woman in the world. Linda Karner was a 28 year cancer survivor, who fought a tireless battle and never gave up. She touched many hearts with her love, her positive attitude, and her perseverance. Not the least of these hearts were the hearts of the Hopkinton Wrestlers. She left the world with a message- Live Your Life Happy or LYLH- and this 5K is to help to spread that message, raise money for cancer, and hopefully start a scholarship fund in her honor.  The Hopkinton Wrestling Team is sponsoring this event which will start at 9AM at Hopkinton High School. Runners will run 3.1 miles around the loop road in Hopkinton to remember Linda Karner and spread her message of LYLH. The cost of the race will be 10 dollars for wrestlers and 15 dollars for nonwrestlers. Registration can take place on this site, please do not make your donations anonymous if you are hoping to register. There are 250 racer spots, if those do not fill then there will be registration on day of. 

Any questions you can reach the race organizer at jessie.karner@gmail.com

story:
Who I Am 

My name is Sean Dail, I am 30, college educated, I work at Barley’s taproom full time and pick up djing shifts two nights a week. I have been saving up for this procedure since March and I haven’t made in the dent into the projected costs. The way that it has been going, it would take me over a decade to pay off this operation along with paying off student loans and other living expenses. I live humbly, I eat where I work, I walk or take the bus, so all of my daily living expenses are minimal. I don’t expect much from others, but just a small donation will go a long way into my future. 

What Happened

In February 2013, days before my 30th birthday, I fainted and my four front teeth impacted into my gums. That day I had been feeling faint, but I dismissed it not realizing the consequences that I am facing today. The initial fall resulted in my teeth breaking along with the bone in my upper gums. After the emergency visit, I was informed in the steps I needed to take from there, but the financial burden of it all was rather daunting, like $10,867.00 in the hole, daunting. This includes surgical removal of the four front teeth, bone graft (for where the teeth broke the bone), guided regenerative tissue (gums), crowns on my canines (to hold the partial plate in place), and dentures.

Just For Laughs

Funny thing about these four front teeth, when I was in second grade I had these same teeth missing and dentures put into place. Who knew I could be able to use my speech therapy later on in life.

Thank You

I appreciate the time you took reading this, and if you are able to help me with this burden, even if you have nothing to give, telling others would go a long way. 

-Thank You

story:
PREPARE THYSELF TO BE PART OF A MIRACLE

Hello,

My name is Oliver and I would like to introduce you to my dear friends, Donna and Joe.  They are truly remarkable  people… for so many reasons that I couldn’t even begin to list them all. Consider the following...

They are more in love and more loving than any couple I’ve ever know.  They’ve been married for 44 years and their love grows exponentially deeper each year… each day.  Just being near them awakens the love and the joy in everyone around them. 

They adopted (or took guardianship of) 17 very special children.

They founded and still direct The RADIANCE HEALING INSTITUTE (a nonprofit organization) which teaches people to love the Divine by loving themselves... and therefore others.

They created SPIRIT OF UNCONDITIONAL LOVE (see www.spiritofunconditionallove.com) which produces a daily recording called “Five Minutes of Love - Five Minutes of Hope. (Please check it out… It is amazing.)

They sponsor a project called CELEBRATIONS OF LOVE through which they give support to individuals and families in which they themselves experienced abuse or neglect or trauma when they were children... and are now learning to live functional, joyous, creative lives that make a difference.

And… they have a passion for working with others who are differently-abled as both Donna and Joe are “disabled.”

Donna was born with Congenital Myasthenic Syndrome.  She has spent most of her life partially paralyzed, in wheelchairs and on oxygen machines… at times even unable to hold her head up or breathe on her own.  

And...Joe was exposed to Agent Orange in Viet Nam and is now in kidney failure.  

Being ill hasn’t stopped them at all.  They continue to live lives of service every single day…Nothing could stop that.   

When they were raising their children, they had a sign on the front door that read:

"PREPARE THYSELF TO BE PART OF A MIRACLE"

It worked. People came into their home conscious of the fact that they wanted - and yes - even needed, to be part of a miracle.

And now, I am inviting you to be part of their miracle…

Five months ago when they first learned of Joe's kidney failure, they suddenly realized that they would need to move away from the home they love so deeply in order to get the medical care that is needed. They had no idea how expenses would be covered.

But in Donna’s words: We are so blessed… so in awe.  Source has provided so many miracles. We have home, we have food, we have love. Every single day we are taken care of.  The only thing we need arefunds for medical bills and medicines, travel expenses and alternative treatments such as acupuncture, chiropractics and physical therapy.” 

If you feel moved to do so – would you please consider helping my dear friends who have spent their lives helping the world to be a more joyous, loving place? 

Every dollar is a sign that you too believe in the power of Love... You too are prepared to be part of a miracle. 

With great gratitude,

Oliver

Ps… Would you please consider passing this along by posting it to your social media and mailing lists?  

Pps… If you want to know more about Donna and Joe, please go towww.spiritofunconditionallove.com and read the “About” page.

story:
While preparing for my first deployment to Iraq, many of my unit's veteran leaders were forced to accept early retirement or medical discharge. After returning to the U.S., more decided to leave rather than face another deployment and separation from their families. This left younger, less experienced soldiers like me to pick up the responsibilities of training without the mentorship and guidance of our veteran leaders. Our first range qualification resulted in only 28% of the unit's 350 soldiers qualifying on their individual weapons.  We had motivated soldiers, but we didn't have enough leaders capable of training them.

With this in mind, I created the Deadeye Coach to give marksmen the data and feedback they need to fix fundamental flaws in their firing and to ensure that their next shot counts. Created as a way to help soldiers on the range, Deadeye Coach has evolved to address the needs of hunters in the field and law enforcement.


At 300 meters, a barrel deflection of less than one degree can be the difference between a clean kill and a two kilometer hike after a wounded animal. The science of marksmanship deals with targets hundreds of meters away, projectiles moving faster than sound, and weapon movements measured in millimeters. The average shooter, focused on her target, is not concerned with the fine points of marksmanship, she needs tools that can identify error and provide specific feedback that can be applied immediately. 

Basic rifle marksmanship is based on four fundamentals:

  • Steady Position
  • Site Picture
  • Breath Control
  • Trigger Squeeze
Flaws in these fundamentals are very hard to detect, even for experts who rely on observation to provide subjective feedback; for a novice these flaws are nearly impossible to detect. Because of technological limits and a general lack of innovation in the marksmanship industry, we are left with an array of ineffective, and often detrimental gadgets. 

With advances in sensor technology brought about by the wide spread use of smart phones, combined with expert knowledge of marksmanship and a large amount of innovation in data analysis, Deadeye Marksmanship is able to offer the quantitative data of high-end training devices with the expert analysis and feedback of an experienced coach in an inexpensive device that is durable enough for live fire.


Deadeye Coach is a small weapon mounted device that detects weapon movement in the fractions of a second prior to discharge. It is in these moments prior to firing when poor trigger squeeze and breath control can cause a deflection in the weapon's intended trajectory. The Deadeye Coach analyzes this data and transmits feedback wirelessly to your phone or mobile device.

Concise feedback can be viewed quickly on a shot-by-shot basis or viewed as a series, shot grouping, qualification event, or historical breakdown. Your shot data can be kept on your device, transmitted to your home computer, or shared with your friends via Facebook, Instagram, or text. Features will also include progress tracking, leader-boards, games, and anything else we can come up with to make the device more useful, functional, and fun.


Matthew Gonzales, Co-founder & CEO                                                                        

Matt previously worked for The University of Texas at San Antonio developing curriculum content and educational programming for the Department of Entrepreneurship and Technology Management while finishing his MBA in Management of Technology. @OmNomAGonz

Matthew Jackson, Co-founder & CFO                                                                          

Is a graduate of the University of Texas at San Antonio and worked in its Small Business Development Center advising local entrepreneurs and business owners. Matt is a winner of the Center for Innovation and Technology Entrepreneurship competition and founded a company based on the technology.                      

Zachary Hamilton, Co-founder & Engineer                                                             Fourteen year U.S. Army veteran and graduate of the University of Texas at San Antonio with a B.S. in electrical engineering. Zack created the Deadeye Coach as a senior design project and won the Center for Innovation and Technology Entrepreneurship competition. @ZackDMS

Tessa Willis, Organization & Marketing

A graduate of the University of Texas at San Antonio business school, Tessa leads our marketing drive.

Ejiroghene Pinnock, Mobile Developer                                                                         

A mobile and physical computing enthusiast who has been developing applications across a host of platforms for 10+ years. E.J. is currently pursuing a B.S in Computer Science at the University of Texas.  


We have three big milestones.

The first is to turn our advanced prototype into beta units. Beta testers will put these units through the ringer to ensure durability, to provide the feedback we need to build on the basic functionality of the mobile app, and to create an interface designed to meet the needs and wants of our customers.

Our second milestone sees the beta design advanced to production quality and includes:

  • Final component list 
  • Machining and assembly files
  • PCB schematics
  • Mobile app release version 1.0
  • Production facilities contracting
  • Component procurement
  • Supply, storage and shipping logistics
  • A big phone bill and a lot of sleepless nights
Our third milestone is manufacturing! This is where we will get Deadeye out to you. We plan for the process to take 6-12 months, six months if everything goes smoothly, but we expect to face challenges during testing and manufacturing that will push our ship date into month nine. Regardless, we will be keeping you informed of set-backs and successes every step of the way. 


No contribution is too small, every step is one closer to realizing our goal, and no amount of funding will go unused. All contributors will receive acknowledgment on our product page and our heartfelt gratitude. 

Perk levels include

  • Decals, t-shirts, caps
  • Lifetime premium membership and access to advanced analytics, social tools, games, and modes
  • Access to our first production run
  • Chance to become a beta tester, get a pre-production unit and see your input in the final product
  • Be credited in the mobile app
  • Special edition units



We have advanced our proof of concept into a working prototype. Now we are focused on:

  • Finalizing the engineering and manufacturing schematics for the final product
  • Improving the mobile app and data interpretation through iteration
  • Developing data models for handgun users
Next up:

  • Package design
  • Product certification
  • Develop supply logistics
  • Material procurement
  • Production


We have been working on Deadeye for two years and we've come a long way, now we need your help. The leap to manufacturing is the last and highest hurdle in making Deadeye available to you and the millions of marksmen looking for a new approach to firing feedback.

So why should you support us now instead of waiting to pick it up at Walmart?

  • Be the first to get one
  • Support innovation in an industry that is often overlooked
  • You want your phone to provide as much data about a weapon that can drop a 300 lbs deer at 400 meters as it does about what Kim Kardashian ate for lunch
Every dollar helps us get closer to our goal, but the most important thing you can do is help spread the word about Deadeye.


If you have any questions about the coach, the team, have a request, or want to make a suggestion please let us know. You can contact us directly through the team links at the bottom of this page, through our website, Facebook or Twitter.

I'm a 6'7, 340 lbs man and I want a t-shirt. How do I let you know my size?

We're in Texas where that makes you a medium. Perks that require shipping will allow you to include any details or requests including size and color. If you forget, don't worry, we'll get in touch with you before we send them out.

Are shipping fees included?

Shipping within the United States is included for all perks. There will be additional shipping costs for international orders of the coach. 

We will ship out t-shirts, caps and decals without additional cost as long as the shipping does not exceed the contribution level, but feel free to include international shipping costs with your contribution.

We do not anticipate customs restrictions limiting availability, but if shipment to your location proves impossible we will reimburse your order.

My team hunts a lot of snakes, but we never seem to hit any. Does Deadeye work with laser rifles?

Conrad "Duke" Hauser 

Deadeye works with small to medium caliber rifles with picatinny rails or with barrel diameters less than one inch.

We are currently testing hardware durability on large caliber rifles and will update our hardware specs depending on results.

Go Joe! 

Does Deadeye work with handguns?

If your handgun has a picatinny rail that fits standard weapon lights then Deadeye will fit your weapon.

Our software development is currently focused on perfecting feedback algorithms for rifle marksmen. As time and funding become available we will be adapting those algorithms to meet the marksmanship requirements of handguns. We expect the additional software to be included as a free update to the Deadeye app shortly after release.

What are the challenges?

Deadeye is a completely new way of looking at marksmanship; the combination of technology and innovation is like nothing else on the market. While a great deal of diligence has gone into designing a great product, there may be manufacturing and production delays outside of our control. We are committed to creating a device that exceeds your expectations and promise timely and transparent communication throughout development and continued support well after Deadeye arrives at your door. Soon, Deadeye will be giving you the feedback to make every shot count.

Any more questions? Contact us directly through our profile links below, or message us through our website, Facebook, or Twitter


Thank you.

story:
A medical* test designed for you and me


Backed by science, in a fresh new package — iTest uses cutting-edge biosensor technology to ensure that you can count on your results.


Designed with feedback from people like you — We spent months prototyping and talking with our customers to create a user experience that is simple, convenient, and reliable.


As easy to use as a smartphone — Using the iTest is as simple as taking a sample, plugging in the consumable, and pressing start on the iTest application. 

Easy as 1, 2, 3, results.




You have the hardest job in the world - iTest is here to help


Be a supermom (or dad!) — You have enough to worry about. iTest is here to help you to know if your child’s cough means strep, or is just a cold.


No more 2am trips to the hospital — iTest allows you to get answers about your health, a loved one’s health, or your child’s health in just a few minutes.


Test anytime, anywhere — Health problems don’t wait for a convenient time to pop up. Be ready for anything.





Healthcare has never been so convenient


Costs less than a copay at the doctor’s office — iTest saves you time and money on basic healthcare.


Fewer trips to the doctor — The power of healthcare in your hands, so you can decide when to test.


Make informed decisions about your health — After you get results, iTest can connect you to resources to help you know what to do next.


3 simple steps, then results. It’s that easy





Get to know the device*




iTest has come a long way, but we need your help to make it a reality


Here at Descue, we are a team of engineers, scientists, designers, ethnographers, and entrepreneurs. We have developed iTest into a prototype that can be used to run basic medical* tests by connecting to a smartphone.

We need your help to finish optimizing, testing, and manufacturing iTest. With every experiment and prototype iteration, we get closer to turning iTest into the high-quality product that will give you new insight into your health, all from your smartphone. As you can see, we’ve come a long way since we first had the idea!




That’s why we’re offering the perks below. Find a perk that works for you, or just donate. We’ve been working on this for 2 years, and we need your help to make it a reality.


Pick up a limited edition "iTest because iCare" T-Shirt!







* Disclaimer: iTest™ has not been cleared or approved by the FDA. This campaign represents Descue Medical's vision of iTest’s final design, which will then be submitted to the FDA for 510(k) clearance before iTest can be marketed and sold. By supporting Descue Medical in this crowdfunding campaign, you are making iTest a reality - the first medical test designed specifically for you.



Want to know more?


See our FAQs for more info on iTest.

Have a question, comment, or request? Head to our Indiegogo page comment section, or say hello at hello@descue.com.


Learn more about iTest and Descue on Descue Medical’s site.
